11461.full: When the Submarine Fleet consists of this boat only: increases this boat's DMG to BBs (does not affect BCs or BBVs) by 20.0%, increases ASR by 1, and increases AMO by 2.

11520.full: Increases FP, TRP, and Accuracy by 15.0% for all Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion DDs in your fleet.

11540.full: While this ship is equipping the Quadruple 380mm Main Gun (Mle 1935): increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 30.0% and Main Gun Crit DMG by 50.0%.

11570.full: When this boat is called into battle: increases the Accuracy of your Vanguard by 20.0% for 20s.

12980.name: The Blue Cruiser
12980.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by $1 and spawns Snezhinka, a summon which fights for $2s and lowers the Speed of enemies hit by it (its DMG dealt and active duration is based on the skill's level.) Additionally, when this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP by $3 (can be stacked up to 5 times.)
12980.full: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and spawns Snezhinka, a summon which fights for 50s and lowers the Speed of enemies hit by it (its DMG dealt and active duration is based on the skill's level.) Additionally, when this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP by 2.0% (can be stacked up to 5 times.)

12990.name: Trajectory Marking
12990.desc: At the start of the battle, increases Main Gun Efficiency by $1 and Accuracy by $2 for all your Northern Parliament DDs that have a Northern Parliament Main Gun equipped.
12990.full: At the start of the battle, increases Main Gun Efficiency by 10.0% and Accuracy by 15.0% for all your Northern Parliament DDs that have a Northern Parliament Main Gun equipped.

13000.name: Cavalier of the Ether
13000.desc: Every 15s: $1 chance to fire a special barrage and inflict Burn for 6s to all enemies hit by it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)
13000.full: Every 15s: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage and inflict Burn for 6s to all enemies hit by it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13010.name: Cavalier's Acumen
13010.desc: Increases this ship's Crit Rate by $1, DMG dealt to enemy DDs by $2, and Main Gun shell velocity by 15.0%. Additionally, decreases the Evasion Rate of enemy DDs by $3.
13010.full: Increases this ship's Crit Rate by 15.0%, DMG dealt to enemy DDs by 20.0%, and Main Gun shell velocity by 15.0%. Additionally, decreases the Evasion Rate of enemy DDs by 10.0%.

13020.name: Lod Obstrel
13020.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: $1 chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
13020.full: When this ship fires a Salvo: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13030.name: Warcry of Unity
13030.desc: For each Northern Parliament and/or Dragon Empery ship in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by $1 (can be stacked up to 4 times.) This skill only works for the first 2 battles of each sortie this ship takes part in.
13030.full: For each Northern Parliament and/or Dragon Empery ship in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times.) This skill only works for the first 2 battles of each sortie this ship takes part in.

13040.name: Mercurial Memories
13040.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to BBs and CAs by $1. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance for it to evade all enemy attacks for $2s (has a 20s cooldown when activated.)
13040.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to BBs and CAs by 20.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance for it to evade all enemy attacks for 10.0s (has a 20s cooldown when activated.)

13050.name: Long Live the Revolution!
13050.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: increases the FP, TRP, AA, and RLD of all your Northern Parliament ships by $1 for 10s. While this ship has the Triple 305mm Main Gun (M1907) equipped: increases this ship's Main Gun Efficiency by $2 and decreases its reload time by $3 for the first 4 reloads.
13050.full: When this ship fires a Salvo: increases the FP, TRP, AA, and RLD of all your Northern Parliament ships by 18.0% for 10s. While this ship has the Triple 305mm Main Gun (M1907) equipped: increases this ship's Main Gun Efficiency by 80.0% and decreases its reload time by 35.0% for the first 4 reloads.

13060.name: Icebreaker
13060.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 and decreases your DDs' DMG taken by $2 until the end of the battle.
13060.full: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0% and decreases your DDs' DMG taken by 10.0% until the end of the battle.

13070.name: Soaring Silver Wings
13070.desc: After this ship finishes loading an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 SB2C Helldiver airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This airstrike inflicts Armor Break to all BBs, BCs, and BBVs hit by it. Armor Break debuff does not stack.
13070.full: After this ship finishes loading an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 SB2C Helldiver airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This airstrike inflicts Armor Break to all BBs, BCs, and BBVs hit by it. Armor Break debuff does not stack.

13080.name: Formation Shift
13080.desc: On the 1st, 3rd, and 5th battles of each sortie that this ship takes part in: increases this ship's AVI by $1. On the 2nd, 4th, and 6th battles: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $2.
13080.full: On the 1st, 3rd, and 5th battles of each sortie that this ship takes part in: increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. On the 2nd, 4th, and 6th battles: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0%.

13090.name: The Fearless Fighting I
13090.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%, activates the following buffs: 1) Decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 for 20s. 2) This ship takes 0 Burn DMG for 30s.
13090.full: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%, activates the following buffs: 1) Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 25.0% for 20s. 2) This ship takes 0 Burn DMG for 30s.

13100.name: Blazing Burst Wings
13100.desc: 1) When this ship fires its Main Guns: $1 chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG to 130.0% for 3s (this buff has a 5s cooldown between activations.) 2) When this ship fires its Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a special HE barrage (this barrage has a 10s cooldown between activations.) Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
13100.full: 1) When this ship fires its Main Guns: 30.0% chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG to 130.0% for 3s (this buff has a 5s cooldown between activations.) 2) When this ship fires its Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a special HE barrage (this barrage has a 10s cooldown between activations.) Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13110.name: One for the Team
13110.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 for 30s; If not in this position, increases this ship's AA by $2 until the end of the battle.
13110.full: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0% for 30s; If not in this position, increases this ship's AA by 25.0% until the end of the battle.

13120.name: Vigilant Supporter
13120.desc: At the start of the battle, if there is a CV or CVL afloat in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's Crit Rate by $1. For each CV or CVL in the same fleet: increases this ship's DMG to enemy DDs and CLs by $2, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. For the first four battles of each sortie that this ship takes part in: decreases DMG taken by $3 for all CVs and CVLs in the same fleet.
13120.full: At the start of the battle, if there is a CV or CVL afloat in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's Crit Rate by 35.0%. For each CV or CVL in the same fleet: increases this ship's DMG to enemy DDs and CLs by 10.0%, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. For the first four battles of each sortie that this ship takes part in: decreases DMG taken by 10.0% for all CVs and CVLs in the same fleet.

13130.name: Black Cat Cyclone
13130.desc: Every 20s: launches a $1 seaplane airstrike, increasing this ship's FP by $2, revealing the location of all enemy SSs for 10s, and increasing the damage they take by $3 for 10s. Once per battle, if this ship has the PBY-5A Catalina equipped when its HP falls below 40.0%: launches a special seaplane airstrike. Airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.
13130.full: Every 20s: launches a Lv.10 seaplane airstrike, increasing this ship's FP by 15.0%, revealing the location of all enemy SSs for 10s, and increasing the damage they take by 10.0% for 10s. Once per battle, if this ship has the PBY-5A Catalina equipped when its HP falls below 40.0%: launches a special seaplane airstrike. Airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.

13140.name: Reno Reactor
13140.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AA by $1 and FP by $2. Every second time another ship in your Main Fleet takes DMG: increases this ship's AA and FP by $3 (can be stacked up to 2 times) until the end of the battle.
13140.full: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and FP by 15.0%. Every second time another ship in your Main Fleet takes DMG: increases this ship's AA and FP by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 2 times) until the end of the battle.

13150.name: Blue Hunter
13150.desc: Increases this boat's DMG against enemy DDs and CLs by $1.
13150.full: Increases this boat's DMG against enemy DDs and CLs by 15.0%.

13160.name: Accomplish Any Feat!
13160.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: $1 chance to fire a special barrage; the barrage is unaffected by this ship's position in your Main Fleet. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
13160.full: When this ship fires a Salvo: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage; the barrage is unaffected by this ship's position in your Main Fleet. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13170.name: Crush Any Contender!
13170.desc: 1) When: a) this ship is afloat, b) the fleet this ship is NOT in has a BB as its Flagship, and c) said fleet is engaging in its 3rd, 4th, or 5th battle: launches a special barrage 20s after the other fleet's battle begins. 2) When this ship is in combat and takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of this ship: fires a special $1 barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level and has a cooldown of 15s between activations.
13170.full: 1) When: a) this ship is afloat, b) the fleet this ship is NOT in has a BB as its Flagship, and c) said fleet is engaging in its 3rd, 4th, or 5th battle: launches a special barrage 20s after the other fleet's battle begins. 2) When this ship is in combat and takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of this ship: fires a special Lv.10 barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level and has a cooldown of 15s between activations.

13180.name: Legacy of Lunga Point
13180.desc: At the start of the battle, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and this ship is in the center of it: increases TRP by $1 and Torpedo Crit Rate by $2 for your DDs and CLs, and also increases the EVA of your DDs by $3.
13180.full: At the start of the battle, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and this ship is in the center of it: increases TRP by 15.0% and Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0% for your DDs and CLs, and also increases the EVA of your DDs by 15.0%.

13190.name: I'm Not Afraid Anymore!
13190.desc: While this ship has a Sakura Empire Main Gun equipped: decreases its DMG taken by $1; while equipping a Main Gun from any other faction: decreases this ship's AA Gun efficiency by 50.0%, but increases its Main Gun efficiency by $2 and Torpedo efficiency by $3, and also fires a special $4 torpedo barrage at the same time as this ship's All Out Assault activates. Torpedo barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
13190.full: While this ship has a Sakura Empire Main Gun equipped: decreases its DMG taken by 12.0%; while equipping a Main Gun from any other faction: decreases this ship's AA Gun efficiency by 50.0%, but increases its Main Gun efficiency by 20.0% and Torpedo efficiency by 50.0%, and also fires a special Lv.10 torpedo barrage at the same time as this ship's All Out Assault activates. Torpedo barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13200.name: Knight's Shooting Training
13200.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 3 Salvos by 40.0%, but DMG dealt will be changed to 40.0%, $1, and $2 each. From the 4th Salvo onwards: this ship deals $2 DMG with its Salvoes.
13200.full: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 3 Salvos by 40.0%, but DMG dealt will be changed to 40.0%, 80.0%, and 120.0% each. From the 4th Salvo onwards: this ship deals 120.0% DMG with its Salvoes.

13210.name: Knight's Formation Drill
13210.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP, RLD, and Accuracy by $1 for every Royal Navy ship in the same fleet. Can be stacked up to 4 times.
13210.full: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP, RLD, and Accuracy by 5.0% for every Royal Navy ship in the same fleet. Can be stacked up to 4 times.

13230.name: Arbiter of Z
13230.desc: At the start of the battle, if there is an Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion CL or CA in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and EVA by $1 and increases FP and AA by $2 for all your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion CLs and CAs.
13230.full: At the start of the battle, if there is an Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion CL or CA in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and EVA by 15.0% and increases FP and AA by 8.0% for all your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion CLs and CAs.

13240.name: The Iris's Flagbearer
13240.desc: When sortied as the Flagship: increases FP, TRP, Accuracy, and RLD by $1 for your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion ships, and also increases DMG dealt by your Iris Libre ships by $2 and decreases DMG taken by your Vichya Dominion ships by $2.
13240.full: When sortied as the Flagship: increases FP, TRP, Accuracy, and RLD by 15.0% for your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion ships, and also increases DMG dealt by your Iris Libre ships by 6.0% and decreases DMG taken by your Vichya Dominion ships by 6.0%.

13250.name: The Iris's Holy Flame
13250.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This barrage has a 70.0% chance to inflict a special Burn to enemies, dealing 119 DMG per tick and decreasing their FP, TRP, and AVI by 5.0% for 30s.
13250.full: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This barrage has a 70.0% chance to inflict a special Burn to enemies, dealing 119 DMG per tick and decreasing their FP, TRP, and AVI by 5.0% for 30s.

13260.name: The Iris's Vindication
13260.desc: While this ship has an HE Main Gun equipped: increases its Main Gun DMG by $1. This ship's first Salvo of each battle will always be a Critical Hit if aimed manually.
13260.full: While this ship has an HE Main Gun equipped: increases its Main Gun DMG by 12.0%. This ship's first Salvo of each battle will always be a Critical Hit if aimed manually.

13270.name: Bellowing Gusts of Fire
13270.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against Burning enemies by $1. 20s after the battle begins, and with a $3 chance whenever this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a $2 barrage that has a chance to Burn enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Has a 10s cooldown if activated by the Main Guns firing.
13270.full: Increases this ship's DMG against Burning enemies by 15.0%. 20s after the battle begins, and with a 70% chance whenever this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 barrage that has a chance to Burn enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Has a 10s cooldown if activated by the Main Guns firing.

13280.name: Divine Aegis
13280.desc: At the start of the battle, and once every 30s after that: deploys a shield that lasts 20s and can block up to 5 enemy torpedoes. While this shield is up: increases this ship's FP by $1 and its DMG against DDs and BBs by $2. 5s after entering Manual Mode: increases this ship's EVA by $3 and Speed by 8. Switching to Auto Mode removes this buff.
13280.full: At the start of the battle, and once every 30s after that: deploys a shield that lasts 20s and can block up to 5 enemy torpedoes. While this shield is up: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and its DMG against DDs and BBs by 12.0%. 5s after entering Manual Mode: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and Speed by 8. Switching to Auto Mode removes this buff.

13290.name: La Pucelle
13290.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against Royal Navy ships by $1. When this ship is Burned: increases its FP, TRP, AA, and EVA by $2 for as long as it is Burning. This ship will catch fire at the start of the battle, taking 8 DMG every 3s for 30s; all non-Burn DMG has a 10.0% chance to refresh this Burn duration.
13290.full: Increases this ship's DMG against Royal Navy ships by 10.0%. When this ship is Burned: increases its FP, TRP, AA, and EVA by 20.0% for as long as it is Burning. This ship will catch fire at the start of the battle, taking 8 DMG every 3s for 30s; all non-Burn DMG has a 10.0% chance to refresh this Burn duration.

13300.name: Holy Prayer
13300.desc: 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: deploys shields around your Vanguard that last for 8s and can absorb up to $1 of your Jeanne d'Arc's max HP. If these shields take too much DMG and break: the ship(s) whose shield broke gets 100% Evasion Rate for 2s; if the shield's duration simply runs out: restores 70 HP to the ship(s) with intact shields.
13300.full: 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: deploys shields around your Vanguard that last for 8s and can absorb up to 6.0% of your Jeanne d'Arc's max HP. If these shields take too much DMG and break: the ship(s) whose shield broke gets 100% Evasion Rate for 2s; if the shield's duration simply runs out: restores 70 HP to the ship(s) with intact shields.

13310.name: Critical Component Protection
13310.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from enemy DD and CL gunfire by $1. At the start of the battle, if your Vanguard consists of only CLs and CAs: increases this ship's Speed by 4 and EVA by $1.
13310.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from enemy DD and CL gunfire by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if your Vanguard consists of only CLs and CAs: increases this ship's Speed by 4 and EVA by 15.0%.

13320.name: Shells of Judgment
13320.desc: Increases this ship's FP and TRP by $1. Every $2 times this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a special barrage at the nearest enemy to this ship.
13320.full: Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 8.0%. Every 5 times this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a special barrage at the nearest enemy to this ship.

13330.name: Sonnez la Charge!
13330.desc: Increases the TRP and EVA of your Vauquelin-class DDs by $1 and increases this ship's FP, AA, and Accuracy by $2 for 30s after the battle starts.
13330.full: Increases the TRP and EVA of your Vauquelin-class DDs by 15.0% and increases this ship's FP, AA, and Accuracy by 12.0% for 30s after the battle starts.

13340.name: Sacrament: Holy Bombardment
13340.desc: When equipping a CL Gun in this ship's Auxiliary Weapon slot: increases that slot's efficiency by $1, sets the gun's Range and Detection Range to 80, and fires a special barrage every 24s; if instead equipping a Dive Bomber: shortens the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by $2.
13340.full: When equipping a CL Gun in this ship's Auxiliary Weapon slot: increases that slot's efficiency by 45.0%, sets the gun's Range and Detection Range to 80, and fires a special barrage every 24s; if instead equipping a Dive Bomber: shortens the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 50%.

13350.name: Sacrament: Sacred Second Wing
13350.desc: 5s after this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: launches a torpedo barrage and a $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This skill can only activate up to 3 times per battle.
13350.full: 5s after this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: launches a torpedo barrage and a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This skill can only activate up to 3 times per battle.

13360.name: Take Off!
13360.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch a special $2 Swordfish airstrike. Special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.
13360.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 70% chance to launch a special Lv.10 Swordfish airstrike. Special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.

13370.name: Prayer for Love and Peace
13370.desc: 12s after the battle begins and $2 chance every 20s after that: summons an air wing that carries out a special $1 airstrike which decreases Hit Rate against your ships by 30.0% for all enemies hit by it (this debuff will weaken over 4s until it is gone.) Special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.
13370.full: 12s after the battle begins and 70% chance every 20s after that: summons an air wing that carries out a special Lv.10 airstrike which decreases Hit Rate against your ships by 30.0% for all enemies hit by it (this debuff will weaken over 4s until it is gone.) Special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.

13380.name: The Wonder of Kula Gulf
13380.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by $1. At the start of the battle, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and there is an Eagle Union ship in the backmost position (other than this ship): increases that ship's EVA by $2.
13380.full: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and there is an Eagle Union ship in the backmost position (other than this ship): increases that ship's EVA by 12.0%.

13390.name: Lemme At 'Em!
13390.desc: Every 30s: $1 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: heals this ship for 10.0% HP and fires this barrage.
13390.full: Every 30s: 100% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: heals this ship for 10.0% HP and fires this barrage.

13400.name: Radar Scan Plus
13400.desc: Every 20s: $1 chance to apply a debuff to all onscreen enemies, increasing the DMG they take by $2 for 10s. When this ship has an SG Radar equipped: increases this ship's EVA by $3, and this skill attempts to activate 16s after the beginning of combat (instead of 20s).
13400.full: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to apply a debuff to all onscreen enemies, increasing the DMG they take by 40.0% for 10s. When this ship has an SG Radar equipped: increases this ship's EVA by 10.0%, and this skill attempts to activate 16s after the beginning of combat (instead of 20s).

13410.name: Mercury's Talaria
13410.desc: This ship starts the battle with $1 Airstrike(s) preloaded, but the loading time of its Airstrikes is increased by 90.0%. Additionally, when this ship launches an Airstrike: heals all ships in your Vanguard for $2 and your Main Fleet for $3 of their respective max HP.
13410.full: This ship starts the battle with 2 Airstrike(s) preloaded, but the loading time of its Airstrikes is increased by 90.0%. Additionally, when this ship launches an Airstrike: heals all ships in your Vanguard for 7.0% and your Main Fleet for 3.5% of their respective max HP.

13420.name: Athena's Catapult
13420.desc: Every 12s after the start of the battle: launches a randomly chosen $1 special airstrike consisting of either Sea Hornets, TBF Avengers, or Fireflies.
13420.full: Every 12s after the start of the battle: launches a randomly chosen Lv.10 special airstrike consisting of either Sea Hornets, TBF Avengers, or Fireflies.

13430.name: Waters of Styx
13430.desc: Increases this ship's max Airstrike capacity to 3 and restores 1.0% HP to all ships in the same fleet as this ship once every $2s. 20s after the fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: heals that fleet's Vanguard for $1 HP.
13430.full: Increases this ship's max Airstrike capacity to 3 and restores 1.0% HP to all ships in the same fleet as this ship once every 20s. 20s after the fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: heals that fleet's Vanguard for 3.0% HP.

13440.name: Synchronized Strike
13440.desc: Every $1s after the start of the battle: fires a $2 special barrage at a randomly chosen enemy (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases Accuracy and RLD by $3 for 8s for all your BBs, BCs, and BBVs.
13440.full: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage at a randomly chosen enemy (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases Accuracy and RLD by 20.0% for 8s for all your BBs, BCs, and BBVs.

13450.name: Covenant of the Immortal Knights
13450.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP and RLD by $1. When sortied together with any of the following: any King George V-class BB, Monarch, or any 3 (or more) Royal Navy ships: increases this ship's FP and AA by $1.
13450.full: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 12.0%. When sortied together with any of the following: any King George V-class BB, Monarch, or any 3 (or more) Royal Navy ships: increases this ship's FP and AA by 12.0%.

13460.name: Bombarda Geminio
13460.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a $1 special barrage; if there are no enemies within 30 units of this ship when this barrage procs: fires a separate $1 special barrage.
13460.full: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage; if there are no enemies within 30 units of this ship when this barrage procs: fires a separate Lv.10 special barrage.

13470.name: Supporting Role
13470.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is NOT in the frontmost position of the Vanguard: increases this ship's FP, TRP, AA, and RLD by $1. Furthermore, if there are other Royal Navy ships in the same fleet: also increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2.
13470.full: At the start of the battle, if this ship is NOT in the frontmost position of the Vanguard: increases this ship's FP, TRP, AA, and RLD by 20.0%. Furthermore, if there are other Royal Navy ships in the same fleet: also increases this ship's DMG dealt by 8.0%.

13480.name: All Out Assault, Open Fire!
13480.desc: 5s after the start of the battle, and with a $2 chance every 30s: launches a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
13480.full: 5s after the start of the battle, and with a 70% chance every 30s: launches a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13490.name: Torpedo Mode? ...Sure!
13490.desc: At the start of the battle and every 20s after that: for 10s, decreases the DMG this ship takes from torpedoes by $1 and changes this ship's torpedo barrage.
13490.full: At the start of the battle and every 20s after that: for 10s, decreases the DMG this ship takes from torpedoes by 20.0% and changes this ship's torpedo barrage.

13500.name: Leading the Way
13500.desc: 10s after this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a $1 special barrage that inflicts Armor Break to all enemies hit by it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)
13500.full: 10s after this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts Armor Break to all enemies hit by it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13510.name: Forward!
13510.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a frontal special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
13510.full: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 50% chance to fire a frontal special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13520.name: Royal Arts: Knight's Arsenal
13520.desc: When equipping a CL Gun in this ship's Secondary Weapon slot: increases that slot's efficiency by $1, sets the gun's Range and Detection Range to 80, and fires a special barrage every 24s; if instead equipping a Dive Bomber: shortens the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by $2.
13520.full: When equipping a CL Gun in this ship's Secondary Weapon slot: increases that slot's efficiency by 45.0%, sets the gun's Range and Detection Range to 80, and fires a special barrage every 24s; if instead equipping a Dive Bomber: shortens the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 50%.

13530.name: Royal Arts: Swordbearing Eagle
13530.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 Swordfish torpedo bomber airstrike.
13530.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 Swordfish torpedo bomber airstrike.

13550.name: The Smiling Sawfish
13550.desc: Increases this boat's Torpedo Crit Rate by $1. At the start of the battle: fires a $2 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
13550.full: Increases this boat's Torpedo Crit Rate by 20.0%. At the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13560.name: Wolf Pack Formation - U-96
13560.desc: Increases Accuracy by $1 and Crit DMG by $2 for all your Iron Blood SSs. Additionally, for each Iron Blood SS in your fleet: increases this boat's Accuracy, RLD, and EVA by $3.
13560.full: Increases Accuracy by 10.0% and Crit DMG by 15.0% for all your Iron Blood SSs. Additionally, for each Iron Blood SS in your fleet: increases this boat's Accuracy, RLD, and EVA by 6.0%.

13570.name: Torpedo-Deflecting Field
13570.desc: 10s after the start of the battle: deploys a shield that lasts 20s and can block up to 3 enemy torpedoes. If this shield is destroyed: fires a retaliatory $1 special torpedo barrage and redeploys this shield 30s later.
13570.full: 10s after the start of the battle: deploys a shield that lasts 20s and can block up to 3 enemy torpedoes. If this shield is destroyed: fires a retaliatory Lv.10 special torpedo barrage and redeploys this shield 30s later.

13580.name: Hope's Tempest
13580.desc: 3s after the battle starts: launches a Saiun recon flight. When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 Shiden Kai 2, Ryuusei, or Saiun airstrike. Saiuns do not attack, but decrease the FP, TRP, and AA of one random enemy (humanoids prioritized) by 3.0% and increase the DMG they take by 3.0% until the battle ends. This debuff can stack up to 3 times.
13580.full: 3s after the battle starts: launches a Saiun recon flight. When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 Shiden Kai 2, Ryuusei, or Saiun airstrike. Saiuns do not attack, but decrease the FP, TRP, and AA of one random enemy (humanoids prioritized) by 3.0% and increase the DMG they take by 3.0% until the battle ends. This debuff can stack up to 3 times.

13590.name: Dreamwaker's Bow
13590.desc: Every 15s: fires a $2 special barrage. During the 1st and 2nd battles this ship fights in during a sortie: increases this ship's AVI by $1. When the fleet this ship is NOT in starts its 3rd, 4th, and 5th battles of a sortie: launches a $2 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) 15s after the battle starts.
13590.full: Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage. During the 1st and 2nd battles this ship fights in during a sortie: increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. When the fleet this ship is NOT in starts its 3rd, 4th, and 5th battles of a sortie: launches a Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) 15s after the battle starts.

13600.name: Protector of the New Moon
13600.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases the FP, EVA, and ASW of your DDs by $1. If the fleet this ship is in contains 3 (or more) Sakura Empire ships: decreases the DMG this ship takes from Main Guns and Aircraft by $2 and increases AVI and Accuracy by $1 for all your Sakura Empire CVs.
13600.full: While this ship is afloat: increases the FP, EVA, and ASW of your DDs by 15.0%. If the fleet this ship is in contains 3 (or more) Sakura Empire ships: decreases the DMG this ship takes from Main Guns and Aircraft by 20.0% and increases AVI and Accuracy by 15.0% for all your Sakura Empire CVs.

13610.name: Kii Fleet Strategy
13610.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
13610.full: Every 20s after the battle starts: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13620.name: Stalwart Advance
13620.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases AA by $1 for your Sakura Empire Main Fleet ships. If the fleet this ship is in contains 3 (or more) Sakura Empire ships: increases this ship's FP by $2 and increases your Vanguard's TRP by $2.
13620.full: While this ship is afloat: increases AA by 15.0% for your Sakura Empire Main Fleet ships. If the fleet this ship is in contains 3 (or more) Sakura Empire ships: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and increases your Vanguard's TRP by 10.0%.

13630.name: Suzutsuki, Breaking Through!
13630.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AA by $1 for each Sakura Empire ship in the same fleet as this ship; when an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: adds 1 stack of this buff. Can stack up to 6 times.
13630.full: Increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% for each Sakura Empire ship in the same fleet as this ship; when an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: adds 1 stack of this buff. Can stack up to 6 times.

13640.name: Suzutsuki, Causing Confusion!
13640.desc: 3s after the battle starts and every 15s after that: fires a special barrage and has a $2 chance to deploy a smokescreen for 5s that increases EVA rate by $1 for all your ships in it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level and the first smokescreen is guaranteed to deploy.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: heals this ship for $3 HP.
13640.full: 3s after the battle starts and every 15s after that: fires a special barrage and has a 30.0% chance to deploy a smokescreen for 5s that increases EVA rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level and the first smokescreen is guaranteed to deploy.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: heals this ship for 15.0% HP.

13650.name: Robust Ballasts
13650.desc: For the first 3 battles of a sortie this ship fights in: decreases the Main Gun DMG this ship takes by $1. If there are 2 (or more) Sakura Empire ships in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's Speed by 10.
13650.full: For the first 3 battles of a sortie this ship fights in: decreases the Main Gun DMG this ship takes by 10.0%. If there are 2 (or more) Sakura Empire ships in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's Speed by 10.

13660.name: Cargo Fire Precautions
13660.desc: While this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases the Burn DMG it takes by $1 and shortens the duration of Burn effects by $2s.
13660.full: While this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases the Burn DMG it takes by 15.0% and shortens the duration of Burn effects by 6s.

13670.name: Veil of Night
13670.desc: After this ship takes DMG 3 times in battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 until the battle ends. During the 2nd, 4th, and 6th battles of a sortie this ship fights in: heals this ship for $2 HP 60s after the battle starts. If there are 2 (or more) Sakura Empire ships in the same fleet as this ship: improves this ship's All Out Assault.
13670.full: After this ship takes DMG 3 times in battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0% until the battle ends. During the 2nd, 4th, and 6th battles of a sortie this ship fights in: heals this ship for 10.0% HP 60s after the battle starts. If there are 2 (or more) Sakura Empire ships in the same fleet as this ship: improves this ship's All Out Assault.

13680.name: Strike Team, Attack!
13680.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches its first Airstrike: launches an additional $1 seaplane airstrike; when it launches its second Airstrike and onwards: $2 chance to launch an additional torpedo bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) If there is a Sakura Empire CVL in the same fleet as this ship: improves these airstrikes.
13680.full: Every battle, when this ship launches its first Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 seaplane airstrike; when it launches its second Airstrike and onwards: 70% chance to launch an additional torpedo bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) If there is a Sakura Empire CVL in the same fleet as this ship: improves these airstrikes.

13690.name: Chiyoda's Domain?
13690.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches its first Airstrike: launches an additional $1 seaplane airstrike; when it launches its second Airstrike and onwards: $2 chance to launch an additional torpedo bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) If there is a Sakura Empire CVL in the same fleet as this ship: improves these airstrikes.
13690.full: Every battle, when this ship launches its first Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 seaplane airstrike; when it launches its second Airstrike and onwards: 70% chance to launch an additional torpedo bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) If there is a Sakura Empire CVL in the same fleet as this ship: improves these airstrikes.

13710.name: Evasive Scramble
13710.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike (airstrikes launched via skills do not count): decreases this ship's aviation DMG taken by $1 for 8s. When this buff wears off: $1 chance to launch an additional $2 TBF Avenger airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
13710.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike (airstrikes launched via skills do not count): decreases this ship's aviation DMG taken by 70% for 8s. When this buff wears off: 70% chance to launch an additional Lv.10 TBF Avenger airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13720.name: Extinguishing Gale
13720.desc: When sortied with Birmingham or when there are at least 3 Eagle Union ships in the fleet: decreases your Vanguard's Burn DMG taken by $1 and Burn duration by $2s; if this ship is your Flagship: further decreases your Vanguard's Burn duration by $2s.
13720.full: When sortied with Birmingham or when there are at least 3 Eagle Union ships in the fleet: decreases your Vanguard's Burn DMG taken by 15.0% and Burn duration by 3s; if this ship is your Flagship: further decreases your Vanguard's Burn duration by 3s.

13730.name: Encore Flare
13730.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a $1 Muse barrage that increases DMG taken by 10.0% for 6s to all enemies hit; if only 1 enemy is hit then their Speed is also set to 0 for 3s and this ship fires an additional torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
13730.full: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 Muse barrage that increases DMG taken by 10.0% for 6s to all enemies hit; if only 1 enemy is hit then their Speed is also set to 0 for 3s and this ship fires an additional torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13740.name: Bilateral Accompaniment
13740.desc: At the start of the battle and every 30s after that: deploys 2 shields that last for $1s; the blue shield can block up to 8 enemy shells, the red shield causes DMG upon contact with an enemy up to 8 times.
13740.full: At the start of the battle and every 30s after that: deploys 2 shields that last for 15s; the blue shield can block up to 8 enemy shells, the red shield causes DMG upon contact with an enemy up to 8 times.

13750.name: Scarlet Waltz
13750.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship's HP is above 45.0% when launching this airstrike: the airstrike becomes more powerful, but this ship takes 200 DMG.
13750.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship's HP is above 45.0% when launching this airstrike: the airstrike becomes more powerful, but this ship takes 200 DMG.

13760.name: Soaring Opening
13760.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AVI by $1 for each additional Muse ship in the same fleet (can be stacked up to 4 times.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 35.0% from being attacked: fires a $2 barrage that heals this ship for 8.0% of the DMG dealt (which is based on the skill's level). After this barrage is fired: decreases the load time of this ship's next Airstrike by $3.
13760.full: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AVI by 6.0% for each additional Muse ship in the same fleet (can be stacked up to 4 times.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 35.0% from being attacked: fires a Lv.10 barrage that heals this ship for 8.0% of the DMG dealt (which is based on the skill's level). After this barrage is fired: decreases the load time of this ship's next Airstrike by 20.0%.

13770.name: Heavenly Hymn
13770.desc: Every 20s after the start of the battle: this ship stops moving for 3s and summons a $1 Iris Angels Airwing to attack (DMG is based on this ship's TRP stat and the skill's level). Additionally, this skill has a 50.0% chance to heal this ship for 3.0% HP when activated.
13770.full: Every 20s after the start of the battle: this ship stops moving for 3s and summons a Lv.10 Iris Angels Airwing to attack (DMG is based on this ship's TRP stat and the skill's level). Additionally, this skill has a 50.0% chance to heal this ship for 3.0% HP when activated.

13780.name: Moment of Slackery
13780.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by $1, and by another 3.0% whenever this ship sinks an enemy (can be stacked up to 3 times; resets between battles). Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, every 25s: heals all DDs in the same fleet for $2 of their max HP.
13780.full: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by 20.0%, and by another 3.0% whenever this ship sinks an enemy (can be stacked up to 3 times; resets between battles). Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, every 25s: heals all DDs in the same fleet for 3.0% of their max HP.

13790.name: Auspice of the Stars
13790.desc: When this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: decreases the Speed of all enemies by $1 for 4s and randomly activates one of the following effects: a) Decreases all enemies' EVA by $2 for 10s, b) For 10s, increases your Vanguard's DMG dealt by $4 and decreases your Main Fleet's DMG taken by $3, c) For 10s, increases your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by $3 and decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken by $3.
13790.full: When this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: decreases the Speed of all enemies by 30.0% for 4s and randomly activates one of the following effects: a) Decreases all enemies' EVA by 15.0% for 10s, b) For 10s, increases your Vanguard's DMG dealt by 15.0% and decreases your Main Fleet's DMG taken by 10.0%, c) For 10s, increases your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by 10.0% and decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken by 10.0%.

13800.name: Blue Spirit
13800.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch an additional airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
13800.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to launch an additional airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13810.name: Lyrical Dedication
13810.desc: At the start of the battle, if your Vanguard is comprised of only this ship: fires a $2 special barrage every 20s and increases the AA of your Flagship by $1; if there are other ships present: fires a $2 powerful barrage every 20s and increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 and AA and Accuracy by $3. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
13810.full: At the start of the battle, if your Vanguard is comprised of only this ship: fires a Lv.10 special barrage every 20s and increases the AA of your Flagship by 15.0%; if there are other ships present: fires a Lv.10 powerful barrage every 20s and increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 and AA and Accuracy by 15.0%. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13820.name: An Opener to Our Friends
13820.desc: For every 2 enemies this ship sinks: increases this ship's AA by $2 for the duration of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times). Additionally, increases this ship's EVA by $1 for 60s after the start of the battle.
13820.full: For every 2 enemies this ship sinks: increases this ship's AA by 10.0% for the duration of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times). Additionally, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 60s after the start of the battle.

13830.name: Beckoning of Ice
13830.desc: At the start of the battle: fires a special barrage and spawns Snezhinka, a summon which fights for $1s and inflicts a 5.0% aircraft DMG taken debuff to all enemies it hits 10 times (its DMG dealt and active duration is based on the skill's level).
13830.full: At the start of the battle: fires a special barrage and spawns Snezhinka, a summon which fights for 50s and inflicts a 5.0% aircraft DMG taken debuff to all enemies it hits 10 times (its DMG dealt and active duration is based on the skill's level).

13840.name: Blue-Purple Tenacity
13840.desc: For the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd battles fought by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP by $1; from the 4th battle onwards: instead increases this ship's AA by $1.
13840.full: For the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd battles fought by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP by 12.0%; from the 4th battle onwards: instead increases this ship's AA by 12.0%.

13850.name: Universal Surprise!
13850.desc: Increases this boat's OXY by $1. When this boat resurfaces: fires a $2 torpedo barrage with a 70.0% chance to inflict Armor Break. When this boat retreats from the battle: fires a $2 torpedo barrage with a 70.0% chance to Burn enemies. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
13850.full: Increases this boat's OXY by 20. When this boat resurfaces: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage with a 70.0% chance to inflict Armor Break. When this boat retreats from the battle: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage with a 70.0% chance to Burn enemies. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13860.name: Armor-Piercing Hypercharge
13860.desc: At the start of the battle, and with a $1 chance every 20s after that: changes this ship's ammo type to $2 special AP for 10s.
13860.full: At the start of the battle, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s after that: changes this ship's ammo type to Lv.10 special AP for 10s.

13870.name: Blazing Choreography
13870.desc: At the start of the battle: if there is a CV, CVL, or Muse ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's EVA by $1 and increases your Vanguard's AA by $2.
13870.full: At the start of the battle: if there is a CV, CVL, or Muse ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and increases your Vanguard's AA by 15.0%.

13880.name: Iron Blood Falcon
13880.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch an additional Torpedo Bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
13880.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to launch an additional Torpedo Bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13890.name: Paralyzing Advance
13890.desc: Decreases the Speed of all enemies by 8.0%. Once every second: $1 chance to set the Speed of all enemies to 0 for 3s (7s cooldown between activations).
13890.full: Decreases the Speed of all enemies by 8.0%. Once every second: 10.0% chance to set the Speed of all enemies to 0 for 3s (7s cooldown between activations).

13900.name: Iron Wings, Blood Pinions
13900.desc: For each Iron Blood ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's AVI by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times); if there are 4 or more Iron Blood ships in the same fleet: reduces the time needed for your Iron Blood CVs and CVLs to reload their first 3 Airstrikes by $2.
13900.full: For each Iron Blood ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times); if there are 4 or more Iron Blood ships in the same fleet: reduces the time needed for your Iron Blood CVs and CVLs to reload their first 3 Airstrikes by 10.0%.

13910.name: Sic 'em, Eisen!
13910.desc: If there is at least 1 other Iron Blood ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's RLD and EVA by $2. When this ship fires its Main Guns: $1 chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG by 25.0% for 3s (7s cooldown between activations).
13910.full: If there is at least 1 other Iron Blood ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's RLD and EVA by 15.0%. When this ship fires its Main Guns: 50.0% chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG by 25.0% for 3s (7s cooldown between activations).

13920.name: Heinrich's Hunch Punch
13920.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and deploys one of the following 2 types of shields, both lasting for $2s, chosen at random: 1) blocks 2 torpedoes, 2) blocks 10 shells.
13920.full: Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and deploys one of the following 2 types of shields, both lasting for 10s, chosen at random: 1) blocks 2 torpedoes, 2) blocks 10 shells.

13930.name: Westward Trident
13930.desc: Increases this boat's OXY by $1 and DMG against Light Armor enemies by $2. When this boat resurfaces: fires a special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
13930.full: Increases this boat's OXY by 20 and DMG against Light Armor enemies by 15.0%. When this boat resurfaces: fires a special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13940.name: Wolf Pack Formation - U-37
13940.desc: Increases this boat's Speed by 3 and RLD by $1. For each Iron Blood SS in the same fleet: increases this boat's TRP, EVA, and Accuracy by $2.
13940.full: Increases this boat's Speed by 3 and RLD by 18.0%. For each Iron Blood SS in the same fleet: increases this boat's TRP, EVA, and Accuracy by 6.0%.

13950.name: The Lonesome Lookout
13950.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch an additional special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). At the start of the battle, if there are 3 or more Iron Blood ships in the same fleet: increases this ship's Crit DMG by $2; if there are no other Iron Blood ships: instead increases this ship's RLD by $3 and AA by $4 and further increases the proc chance of this ship's special airstrike by 30.0%.
13950.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 70.0% chance to launch an additional special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). At the start of the battle, if there are 3 or more Iron Blood ships in the same fleet: increases this ship's Crit DMG by 20.0%; if there are no other Iron Blood ships: instead increases this ship's RLD by 10.0% and AA by 15.0% and further increases the proc chance of this ship's special airstrike by 30.0%.

13960.name: Galvanizing Shield
13960.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: deploys a shield that lasts for $1s and can block 6 shells on a randomly chosen ship in your Vanguard; if the shield is deployed on an Iron Blood ship: also increases that ship's FP by $2 for 8s and heals Weser for $3 HP.
13960.full: Every 20s after the battle starts: deploys a shield that lasts for 8s and can block 6 shells on a randomly chosen ship in your Vanguard; if the shield is deployed on an Iron Blood ship: also increases that ship's FP by 15.0% for 8s and heals Weser for 5.0% HP.

13970.name: Follow My Lead... Please!
13970.desc: Every 15s after the battle starts: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases the EXP earned by SSs and SSVs that participated in the battle by $2.
13970.full: Every 15s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases the EXP earned by SSs and SSVs that participated in the battle by 10.0%.

13980.name: No Strange Ideas, Please!
13980.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by $1 and the AA of your Iron Blood ships by $2. Whenever 3 enemy aircraft are shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's AA by $3 until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times).
13980.full: Increases this ship's TRP by 10.0% and the AA of your Iron Blood ships by 15.0%. Whenever 3 enemy aircraft are shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's AA by 5.0% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times).

13990.name: Boon of Crimson Darkness
13990.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against DDs and CLs by $1. Once per battle, when the HP of one of your Z-class DDs (excluding this ship) falls below 30.0%: decreases that ship's DMG taken by 30.0% and increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by $2 until the end of the battle.
13990.full: Increases this ship's DMG against DDs and CLs by 15.0%. Once per battle, when the HP of one of your Z-class DDs (excluding this ship) falls below 30.0%: decreases that ship's DMG taken by 30.0% and increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 15.0% until the end of the battle.

14000.name: Fiendish Rampage
14000.desc: At the start of the battle and every 20s after that: fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Whenever this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $2 until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 5 times).
14000.full: At the start of the battle and every 20s after that: fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Whenever this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 4.0% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 5 times).

14010.name: I Love My Sisters!
14010.desc: Increases FP and Accuracy by $1 and AA by $2 for your Z-class DDs; if there is another Z-class DD in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $1 and ASW by $2.
14010.full: Increases FP and Accuracy by 10.0% and AA by 15.0% for your Z-class DDs; if there is another Z-class DD in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0% and ASW by 15.0%.

14020.name: I'll Protect the Vanguard!
14020.desc: At the start of the battle: deploys a smokescreen and fires a special barrage; the smokescreen has a $1 chance to proc again every 15s after. When your Flagship takes DMG: $3 chance to fire the same special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 20s cooldown between barrage activations). Smokescreen lasts 5s and increases Evasion Rate by $2 for all your ships in it. Does not stack with other smokescreen skills.
14020.full: At the start of the battle: deploys a smokescreen and fires a special barrage; the smokescreen has a 30.0% chance to proc again every 15s after. When your Flagship takes DMG: 70% chance to fire the same special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 20s cooldown between barrage activations). Smokescreen lasts 5s and increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it. Does not stack with other smokescreen skills.

14030.name: Ontological Rudder
14030.desc: When this ship takes DMG: increases this ship's FP and EVA by $1 (can be stacked up to 5 times). After reaching 5 stacks, this ship gains 5 Speed and fires a special barrage (30s cooldown when activated and DMG is based on the skill's level).
14030.full: When this ship takes DMG: increases this ship's FP and EVA by 3.0% (can be stacked up to 5 times). After reaching 5 stacks, this ship gains 5 Speed and fires a special barrage (30s cooldown when activated and DMG is based on the skill's level).

14040.name: Protologia of Illumination
14040.desc: Every 15s: $1 chance to increase the Accuracy of your Vanguard by $2 for 10s.
14040.full: Every 15s: 50.0% chance to increase the Accuracy of your Vanguard by 20.0% for 10s.

14050.name: Viola Spear
14050.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a special barrage (10s cooldown when activated and DMG is based on the skill's level). When there are 2 or more Sardegnian ships in your fleet: increases this barrage's proc chance by 20.0%.
14050.full: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 50.0% chance to fire a special barrage (10s cooldown when activated and DMG is based on the skill's level). When there are 2 or more Sardegnian ships in your fleet: increases this barrage's proc chance by 20.0%.

14580.desc:
Increases this ship's EVA and AA by $1. Activates one of the following effects based on this ship's position in your Vanguard during battle:
1) Front (and also when this ship is your last afloat Vanguard ship): increases this ship's EVA and AA by $2, and decreases her DMG taken by $3.
2) Middle: heals all ships in your Vanguard for $4 of their max HP 20s after the battle starts.
3) Rear: increases this ship's FP by $3 and AA by $1, and also increases your whole Vanguard's DMG dealt to enemies by 5.0%.
14580.full:
Increases this ship's EVA and AA by 10.0%. Activates one of the following effects based on this ship's position in your Vanguard during battle:
1) Front (and also when this ship is your last afloat Vanguard ship): increases this ship's EVA and AA by 5.0%, and decreases her DMG taken by 15.0%.
2) Middle: heals all ships in your Vanguard for 10.0% of their max HP 20s after the battle starts.
3) Rear: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and AA by 10.0%, and also increases your whole Vanguard's DMG dealt to enemies by 5.0%.

14590.name: Hottie Hunters
14590.desc: Increases this boat's DMG to Heavy Armor enemies by $1. When sortied with at least 1 other Eagle Union submarine: increases Crit DMG by $2 and increases TRP and Accuracy by $3 for all your Eagle Union submarines.
14590.full: Increases this boat's DMG to Heavy Armor enemies by 15.0%. When sortied with at least 1 other Eagle Union submarine: increases Crit DMG by 15.0% and increases TRP and Accuracy by 8.0% for all your Eagle Union submarines.

14600.name: Parting Gift
14600.desc: Increases this boat's OXY by $1. When this boat resurfaces, and again when she leaves the battle: fires a $2 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
14600.full: Increases this boat's OXY by 20. When this boat resurfaces, and again when she leaves the battle: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14610.name: The Bigger They Are...
14610.desc: Every 15s during battle: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Additionally, increases this ship's Crit Rate by $2, and increases her DMG to Heavy Armor enemies by $3.
14610.full: Every 15s during battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Additionally, increases this ship's Crit Rate by 10.0%, and increases her DMG to Heavy Armor enemies by 15.0%.

14620.name: Breathe In, Breathe Out
14620.desc: While this ship has 45.0% or more HP remaining: increases this ship's FP and AA by $1. When this ship's HP falls below 45.0% as a result of DMG taken: decreases this ship's Burn DMG taken by $2 while below this threshold. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: heals this ship for $3 of her max HP.
14620.full: While this ship has 45.0% or more HP remaining: increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0%. When this ship's HP falls below 45.0% as a result of DMG taken: decreases this ship's Burn DMG taken by 15.0% while below this threshold. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: heals this ship for 10.0% of her max HP.

14630.name: Supporting Wings - Independence
14630.desc:
Improves the "Knight of the Sky" TBF Avenger airstrike. Additionally, the following buffs are active as long as this ship is afloat (does not stack with the "Supporting Wings" skill):
1) At the start of the battle, increases AVI by $1 and RLD by $2 for all CVs and CVLs in the same fleet this ship is in, and decreases the load time of this ship's first Airstrike by $3.
2) At the start of the battle, increases RLD and AVI by $4 for all CVs and CVLs in the fleet this ship is NOT in.
14630.full:
Improves the "Knight of the Sky" TBF Avenger airstrike. Additionally, the following buffs are active as long as this ship is afloat (does not stack with the "Supporting Wings" skill):
1) At the start of the battle, increases AVI by 12.0% and RLD by 10.0% for all CVs and CVLs in the same fleet this ship is in, and decreases the load time of this ship's first Airstrike by 25.0%.
2) At the start of the battle, increases RLD and AVI by 8.0% for all CVs and CVLs in the fleet this ship is NOT in.

14650.name: Strike Orders Received!
14650.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by $1. While there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard: increases your Vanguard's FP and Accuracy by $2.
14650.full: Increases this ship's TRP by 10.0%. While there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard: increases your Vanguard's FP and Accuracy by 10.0%.

14660.name: Torpedo Orders Received!
14660.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to DDs by $1. When this ship fires her Torpedoes: $2 chance to launch a second wave of torpedoes.
14660.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to DDs by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Torpedoes: 30.0% chance to launch a second wave of torpedoes.

14670.name: Gales and Thunder
14670.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by $1 and RLD by $2. Whenever this ship's All-Out Assault skill activates: decreases the loading time of this ship's next Torpedo wave by $3s.
14670.full: Increases this ship's TRP by 5.0% and RLD by 15.0%. Whenever this ship's All-Out Assault skill activates: decreases the loading time of this ship's next Torpedo wave by 3.0s.

14680.name: Kazagumo's Air Raid Assistance
14680.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases DMG dealt by your CVs and CVLs by $1 (does not stack with "Air Raid Assistance"). When this ship fires her 4th wave of Torpedoes: restores $2 HP for the lowest HP percentage CV/CVL currently afloat in your fleet; if your Flagship is a CV: additionally restores $3 HP for that ship.
14680.full: While this ship is afloat: increases DMG dealt by your CVs and CVLs by 15.0% (does not stack with "Air Raid Assistance"). When this ship fires her 4th wave of Torpedoes: restores 10.0% HP for the lowest HP percentage CV/CVL currently afloat in your fleet; if your Flagship is a CV: additionally restores 5.0% HP for that ship.

14700.name: Foo and Friends and Kasumi Too
14700.desc: At the start of the battle, if Kasumi is sortied with 2 or more friends in your Vanguard: increases the TRP of your Sakura Empire Vanguard ships by $1. Additionally, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, every 20s after the start of the battle: $2 chance to fire a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
14700.full: At the start of the battle, if Kasumi is sortied with 2 or more friends in your Vanguard: increases the TRP of your Sakura Empire Vanguard ships by 15.0%. Additionally, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, every 20s after the start of the battle: 70% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14710.name: Destruction Bolt
14710.desc: Every 20s after the start of battle: launches a $1 special barrage with a special Swordfish airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) that reduces the AA of enemies hit by 8.0% for 5s, and increases the DMG dealt by destroyers and Royal Navy Vanguard ships by $2 for 8s.
14710.full: Every 20s after the start of battle: launches a Lv.10 special barrage with a special Swordfish airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) that reduces the AA of enemies hit by 8.0% for 5s, and increases the DMG dealt by destroyers and Royal Navy Vanguard ships by 10.0% for 8s.

14720.name: Support Robot Mk IV
14720.desc: 3s after the battle starts and every 20s: summons a support robot for 10s. When summoned, the robot: 1) fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and spawns 2 shields that can each block up to 10 enemy shells, lasting for up to 5s; 2) heals the ship in your Vanguard with the lowest % of HP left for 0.5% of her max HP 3 times over 10s; 3) increases your fleet's AA by $2 while it is deployed.
14720.full: 3s after the battle starts and every 20s: summons a support robot for 10s. When summoned, the robot: 1) fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and spawns 2 shields that can each block up to 10 enemy shells, lasting for up to 5s; 2) heals the ship in your Vanguard with the lowest % of HP left for 0.5% of her max HP 3 times over 10s; 3) increases your fleet's AA by 15.0% while it is deployed.

14730.name: Combat Mechanic
14730.desc: Increases this ship's AA by $1 of her total TRP stat (base stats plus gear) and decreases the Burn DMG she takes by $2. This ship heals herself for 1.0% of her max HP every 15s in combat.
14730.full: Increases this ship's AA by 50.0% of her total TRP stat (base stats plus gear) and decreases the Burn DMG she takes by 15.0%. This ship heals herself for 1.0% of her max HP every 15s in combat.

14740.name: The Intrepid Nautilus
14740.desc: At the start of the battle: this boat moves forward a set distance, then fires a $1 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and briefly resurfaces. Afterwards, she submerges and moves back into attack position, then fires a stronger $1 torpedo barrage. This boat takes $2 less DMG while resurfaced as part of this skill's effect.
14740.full: At the start of the battle: this boat moves forward a set distance, then fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and briefly resurfaces. Afterwards, she submerges and moves back into attack position, then fires a stronger Lv.10 torpedo barrage. This boat takes 60.0% less DMG while resurfaced as part of this skill's effect.

14750.name: Lure
14750.desc: When this boat is hit by an enemy: increases that enemy's DMG taken by $1 for 3s. If the enemy is a DD: also decreases that enemy's Speed by $2 for 5s.
14750.full: When this boat is hit by an enemy: increases that enemy's DMG taken by 8.0% for 3s. If the enemy is a DD: also decreases that enemy's Speed by 20.0% for 5s.

14760.name: Sunglint Phantasm
14760.desc: Increases this ship's FP, AA, and ASW by $1. At the start of the battle, if there is a Sakura Empire DD afloat in your Vanguard: every 18s, targets your Vanguard ship with the lowest % of HP left and heals her for $2 HP (can activate up to 4 times per battle); if no Sakura Empire DD is present, instead increases this ship's TRP by $1 and, with a 70.0% chance every 18s: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
14760.full: Increases this ship's FP, AA, and ASW by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if there is a Sakura Empire DD afloat in your Vanguard: every 18s, targets your Vanguard ship with the lowest % of HP left and heals her for 3.0% HP (can activate up to 4 times per battle); if no Sakura Empire DD is present, instead increases this ship's TRP by 15.0% and, with a 70.0% chance every 18s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14770.name: Blessed Self
14770.desc: Increases your Sakura Empire DDs' TRP and RLD by $1 and AA by $2.
14770.full: Increases your Sakura Empire DDs' TRP and RLD by 10.0% and AA by 20.0%.

14780.name: All-Seeing Eye
14780.desc: At the start of the battle and every 20s: decreases this ship's Speed by 5.0% for 3s and fires a $4 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat). Enemies hit by seaplanes launched from this barrage have their Speed decreased by $1 for 5s, and both the following effects activate: 1) if there is a Sakura Empire CV afloat in your Main Fleet when this barrage fires: 50.0% chance to inflict a $3 aircraft DMG taken debuff for 8s to enemies hit by the barrage; 2) $2 chance to inflict 1 of the following randomly chosen debuffs for 10s: a) decreases EVA by 10.0%; b) decreases Accuracy by 10.0%; c) decreases the enemy's DMG dealt by 10.0%.
14780.full: At the start of the battle and every 20s: decreases this ship's Speed by 5.0% for 3s and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat). Enemies hit by seaplanes launched from this barrage have their Speed decreased by 30.0% for 5s, and both the following effects activate: 1) if there is a Sakura Empire CV afloat in your Main Fleet when this barrage fires: 50.0% chance to inflict a 6.0% aircraft DMG taken debuff for 8s to enemies hit by the barrage; 2) 100% chance to inflict 1 of the following randomly chosen debuffs for 10s: a) decreases EVA by 10.0%; b) decreases Accuracy by 10.0%; c) decreases the enemy's DMG dealt by 10.0%.

14790.name: All-Obscuring Eye
14790.desc: When this ship's Speed decreases as a result of her skills activating: increases her Evasion Rate by $2 for the duration of the decrease. Decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1. When this ship takes DMG: 70.0% chance to decrease her Speed by 10.0% and increase her RLD, FP, and EVA by $1 for 7s (10s cooldown between activations).
14790.full: When this ship's Speed decreases as a result of her skills activating: increases her Evasion Rate by 10.0% for the duration of the decrease. Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 70.0% chance to decrease her Speed by 10.0% and increase her RLD, FP, and EVA by 20.0% for 7s (10s cooldown between activations).

14800.name: Reverent and Graceful
14800.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases your DDs' and CLs' Accuracy and Torpedo Crit Rate by $1.
14800.full: While this ship is afloat: increases your DDs' and CLs' Accuracy and Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0%.

14810.name: Delicate but Devoted
14810.desc: When this ship launches her Torpedoes: increases this ship's EVA by $1 and decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by $2 for 10s.
14810.full: When this ship launches her Torpedoes: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0% for 10s.

14820.name: Motivating Roooaaar
14820.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ASW by $1. Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Submarines by $2, but increases her DMG taken from Submarines by 5.0%. If there are 3 ships in your Vanguard when the battle starts: increases this ship's TRP by $3.
14820.full: Increases this ship's FP and ASW by 15.0%. Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Submarines by 20.0%, but increases her DMG taken from Submarines by 5.0%. If there are 3 ships in your Vanguard when the battle starts: increases this ship's TRP by 10.0%.

14830.name: Late-Blooming Airstrike
14830.desc: Increases this ship's Accuracy by $1. When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $2 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) and, for 8s, decreases all enemies' Accuracy and RLD by $3.
14830.full: Increases this ship's Accuracy by 15.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) and, for 8s, decreases all enemies' Accuracy and RLD by 15.0%.

14840.name: Veil of Azaleas
14840.desc: Increases this ship's max Detection Gauge value by 15 and decreases her DMG taken from aircraft by $1. At the start of the battle, if there are 3 Sakura Empire ships in your Vanguard: decreases all your Sakura Empire ships' DMG taken from aircraft by $2.
14840.full: Increases this ship's max Detection Gauge value by 15 and decreases her DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%. At the start of the battle, if there are 3 Sakura Empire ships in your Vanguard: decreases all your Sakura Empire ships' DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%.

14850.name: Upon the Wind's Edge
14850.desc: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: fires a $1 special barrage and executes a slashing attack. Enemies hit by this slashing attack take $2 increased DMG from this ship for 3s, and inflicts a unique Flooding ailment (lasts 6s) to enemies hit by her torpedoes (Flooding deals 179 DMG per tick; 1 tick occurs every 3s; barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).
14850.full: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: fires a Lv.10 special barrage and executes a slashing attack. Enemies hit by this slashing attack take 8.0% increased DMG from this ship for 3s, and inflicts a unique Flooding ailment (lasts 6s) to enemies hit by her torpedoes (Flooding deals 179 DMG per tick; 1 tick occurs every 3s; barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).

14860.name: Before the Lightning's Flash
14860.desc: At the start of the battle, and when this ship's Torpedoes finish reloading: for 10s, decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1, increases her DMG dealt with Torpedoes by $2, and increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 (these effects cannot be stacked; overlapping activations will simply refresh the effect timers if possible).
14860.full: At the start of the battle, and when this ship's Torpedoes finish reloading: for 10s, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%, increases her DMG dealt with Torpedoes by 12.0%, and increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 (these effects cannot be stacked; overlapping activations will simply refresh the effect timers if possible).

14870.name: Within the Thunder's Roar
14870.desc: Increases this ship's Accuracy by $1 and decreases her torpedo DMG taken by 10.0%. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle, that fleet gains the following buffs: 1) 30s after the battle starts: fires a $2 supporting torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); 2) If the fleet Shimakaze is NOT in has 1 or more DDs: increases your DDs' TRP by $3 until the battle ends.
14870.full: Increases this ship's Accuracy by 15.0% and decreases her torpedo DMG taken by 10.0%. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle, that fleet gains the following buffs: 1) 30s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 supporting torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); 2) If the fleet Shimakaze is NOT in has 1 or more DDs: increases your DDs' TRP by 10.0% until the battle ends.

14890.name: Nightmare of Solomon+
14890.desc: Increases this ship's FP, TRP, RLD, and EVA by $1, and increases her DMG dealt to Burning enemies by $2. After the battle starts: for 30s, increases your Vanguard's Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0% and Torpedo Crit DMG by $3.
14890.full: Increases this ship's FP, TRP, RLD, and EVA by 20.0%, and increases her DMG dealt to Burning enemies by 15.0%. After the battle starts: for 30s, increases your Vanguard's Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0% and Torpedo Crit DMG by 25.0%.

14900.name: Feral Claws
14900.desc: Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 5.0% and decreases her cannon DMG taken by $2. Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on this skill's level; inflicts a unique Burn ailment on hit).
14900.full: Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 5.0% and decreases her cannon DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on this skill's level; inflicts a unique Burn ailment on hit).

14910.name: Crescent City Bonds
14910.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard and there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 and increases DMG dealt by $2 for the ship in the center position of your Vanguard.
14910.full: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard and there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% and increases DMG dealt by 10.0% for the ship in the center position of your Vanguard.

14920.name: Nola Finale
14920.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and deploys a barrier that can block $2 DMG and lasts up to 8s. If this barrier is destroyed: heals this ship for $3 HP; if the barrier expires: instead increases this ship's FP and RLD by $4.
14920.full: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and deploys a barrier that can block 8.0% DMG and lasts up to 8s. If this barrier is destroyed: heals this ship for 6.0% HP; if the barrier expires: instead increases this ship's FP and RLD by 10.0%.

14930.name: Terrific Terror
14930.desc: Every 20s: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship lands 5 consecutive Main Gun hits on the same enemy: increases this ship's FP by $2 (can be stacked up to 4 times; upon reaching 4 stacks: also increases this ship's TRP by $3 and fires her special barrage).
14930.full: Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship lands 5 consecutive Main Gun hits on the same enemy: increases this ship's FP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times; upon reaching 4 stacks: also increases this ship's TRP by 20.0% and fires her special barrage).

14940.name: I'll Give You A Head Start~
14940.desc: Increases this ship's SPD by $1. When the battle starts, if there is 1 or more other DDs in your Vanguard: increases this ship's SPD by a further $1 and increases her EVA and AA by $2; if this ship is the sole DD: increases this ship's RLD by $2 and decreases her DMG taken by $3.
14940.full: Increases this ship's SPD by 7. When the battle starts, if there is 1 or more other DDs in your Vanguard: increases this ship's SPD by a further 7 and increases her EVA and AA by 20.0%; if this ship is the sole DD: increases this ship's RLD by 20.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 5.0%.

14950.name: Templar's Holy Advance
14950.desc: Increases this ship's AA and ASW by $1; If sortied in the same fleet as Richelieu or either 3 or more Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ships: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by $2. When this ship is attacked: 15.0% chance to deploy a shield that lasts up to 12s and can block up to 10 shots, and decreases this ship's SPD by 3 (this effect can only activate once every 12s).
14950.full: Increases this ship's AA and ASW by 10.0%; If sortied in the same fleet as Richelieu or either 3 or more Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ships: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 10.0%. When this ship is attacked: 15.0% chance to deploy a shield that lasts up to 12s and can block up to 10 shots, and decreases this ship's SPD by 3 (this effect can only activate once every 12s).

14960.name: The Flawless Knife-Thrower
14960.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AA by $1. If the fleet this ship is in has the Out of Ammo debuff: reduces the DMG debuff effect on this ship by $2.
14960.full: Increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0%. If the fleet this ship is in has the Out of Ammo debuff: reduces the DMG debuff effect on this ship by 15.0%.

14970.name: Circumspect Vigilance
14970.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to CAs and CBs by $3. Every 20s: $1 chance to increase this ship's ACC and RLD by $2 for 10s.
14970.full: Increases this ship's DMG to CAs and CBs by 20.0%. Every 20s: 70% chance to increase this ship's ACC and RLD by 20.0% for 10s.

14980.name: Get Hyped!
14980.desc: When the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $1 (can be stacked up to 4 times). When this ship sinks an enemy in combat: increases this ship's ACC and EVA by $2 (can be stacked up to 4 times).
14980.full: When the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times). When this ship sinks an enemy in combat: increases this ship's ACC and EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times).

14985.name: Future Content
14985.desc: When the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $1 (can be stacked up to 4 times). When this ship sinks an enemy in combat: increases this ship's ACC and EVA by $2 (can be stacked up to 4 times).
14985.full: When the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times). When this ship sinks an enemy in combat: increases this ship's ACC and EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times).

14990.name: Scorching Combo
14990.desc:
