Increases this ship's AA by $1. 
3s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead increases this ship's FP and TRP by $3 (can be stacked up to 2 times; when stacked twice: increases the barrage's proc chance to 100.0%). After the 2nd and 4th battles in a sortie: improves this barrage.
14990.full:
Increases this ship's AA by 15.0%. 
3s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0% (can be stacked up to 2 times; when stacked twice: increases the barrage's proc chance to 100.0%). After the 2nd and 4th battles in a sortie: improves this barrage.

15000.name: Bad Girl's Surprise Strike
15000.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by $3. When this ship finishes loading an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch a $2 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15000.full: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%. When this ship finishes loading an Airstrike: 80.0% chance to launch a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15010.name: Good Girl at Heart
15010.desc: At the start of the battle, and when this ship launches an Airstrike: spawns a shield around the frontmost ship of your Vanguard (lasts $1s, can block up to 6 enemy shots; the shield's duration is refreshed if its spawn conditions are met while it is still active). If this shield is destroyed rather than expiring: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2 until her next Airstrike.
15010.full: At the start of the battle, and when this ship launches an Airstrike: spawns a shield around the frontmost ship of your Vanguard (lasts 8s, can block up to 6 enemy shots; the shield's duration is refreshed if its spawn conditions are met while it is still active). If this shield is destroyed rather than expiring: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% until her next Airstrike.

15020.name: Knockout Shot
15020.desc: Increases this ship's ACC by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between barrage activations).
15020.full: Increases this ship's ACC by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between barrage activations).

15030.name: Taking One for the Team
15030.desc: Once every 20s, while this ship's HP is above 60.0%: spawns a shield around this ship (lasts 8s, can negate $1 of this ship's max HP in DMG); if there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard, and this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: doubles the amount of DMG this shield can negate, and this ship tanks 50.0% of the DMG your other Vanguard ships take for 8s. While this ship's HP is below 60.0%: the above effect will not activate; instead, this ship's TRP increases by $2.
15030.full: Once every 20s, while this ship's HP is above 60.0%: spawns a shield around this ship (lasts 8s, can negate 4.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG); if there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard, and this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: doubles the amount of DMG this shield can negate, and this ship tanks 50.0% of the DMG your other Vanguard ships take for 8s. While this ship's HP is below 60.0%: the above effect will not activate; instead, this ship's TRP increases by 15.0%.

15040.name: Th-That Was an Accident!
15040.desc: Decreases this ship's OXY by $1. When this boat resurfaces, and when she retreats from battle: increases this boat's DMG dealt by $2. While this boat is retreating: increases this boat's SPD by 50.0%.
15040.full: Decreases this ship's OXY by 10. When this boat resurfaces, and when she retreats from battle: increases this boat's DMG dealt by 15.0%. While this boat is retreating: increases this boat's SPD by 50.0%.

15050.name: The Laurel of Prosody
15050.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; inflicts a minus $3 SPD debuff for 3s to enemies hit). When an enemy gets within close proximity of this ship: fires a $4 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 15s cooldown between activations).
15050.full: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; inflicts a minus 30.0% SPD debuff for 3s to enemies hit). When an enemy gets within close proximity of this ship: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 15s cooldown between activations).

15060.name: In Ridicule of Fools
15060.desc: Increases this ship's FP and RLD by $1. When this ship equips a Main Gun which uses HE ammo: increases this ship's DMG dealt to Light and Medium Armor enemies by $2. At the start of the battle, if this ship is NOT the Flagship: decreases this ship's Main Gun reload time by 50.0%, but decreases her Main Gun DMG dealt by $3.
15060.full: Increases this ship's FP and RLD by 15.0%. When this ship equips a Main Gun which uses HE ammo: increases this ship's DMG dealt to Light and Medium Armor enemies by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if this ship is NOT the Flagship: decreases this ship's Main Gun reload time by 50.0%, but decreases her Main Gun DMG dealt by 45.0%.

15070.name: Revolutionary's Prosaic

15090.name: Whirlpool Warning?
15090.desc:
When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by $1. 
Every 20s: $2 chance to spawn a whirlpool that draws in and deals DMG to enemies for 1s (whirlpool DMG is based on the skill's level).
15090.full:
When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 10.0%. 
Every 20s: 75.0% chance to spawn a whirlpool that draws in and deals DMG to enemies for 1s (whirlpool DMG is based on the skill's level).

15100.name: Single-Minded
15100.desc: Every time 2 enemy aircraft are shot down within your Vanguard's AA range: increases this ship's AA by $1 (can be stacked up to 5 times). Once, 10s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 15s after the duration of the first activation: for 10s, increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2, but increases her DMG taken by $3.
15100.full: Every time 2 enemy aircraft are shot down within your Vanguard's AA range: increases this ship's AA by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 5 times). Once, 10s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 15s after the duration of the first activation: for 10s, increases this ship's DMG dealt by 30.0%, but increases her DMG taken by 5.0%.

15110.name: Scrollbearer of Turbulent Seas
15110.desc:
When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by $1; if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: also increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2. 
Every 3rd time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases your Dragon Empery ships' FP and TRP by $2 for 8s.
15110.full:
When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 25.0%; if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: also increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0%. 
Every 3rd time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases your Dragon Empery ships' FP and TRP by 12.0% for 8s.

15120.name: Wanderer of Azure Mists
15120.desc: While this ship is inside a smokescreen: decreases this ship's SPD by 8, and increases DMG dealt by $1; While this ship is not inside a smokescreen, decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1.
15120.full: While this ship is inside a smokescreen: decreases this ship's SPD by 8, and increases DMG dealt by 12.0%; While this ship is not inside a smokescreen, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0%.

15130.name: Wave-Breaking Speardancer
15130.desc:
When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by $1; if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and TRP dealt by $2. 
Every 3rd time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by this barrage take $2 increased DMG from this ship for 8s.
15130.full:
When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 25.0%; if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and TRP dealt by 12.0%. 
Every 3rd time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by this barrage take 12.0% increased DMG from this ship for 8s.

15140.name: A Journey from Heaven to Sea
15140.desc:
Once, when the battle starts, and with a $1 chance every 15s after that: deploys a smokescreen that increases Evasion Rate by $1 for all your ships in it (smokescreen lasts 5s; Evasion Rate buff does not stack with other smokescreen skills). When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: increases the proc chance of this smokescreen to $4 and decreases the DMG penalty of the debuff by $2. 
Every 20s: 50.0% chance to restore $3 HP for the lowest HP percentage BB/BC in your fleet (this effect can only activate up to 2 times per battle.)
15140.full:
Once, when the battle starts, and with a 40.0% chance every 15s after that: deploys a smokescreen that increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (smokescreen lasts 5s; Evasion Rate buff does not stack with other smokescreen skills). When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: increases the proc chance of this smokescreen to 80.0% and decreases the DMG penalty of the debuff by 15.0%. 
Every 20s: 50.0% chance to restore 3.5% HP for the lowest HP percentage BB/BC in your fleet (this effect can only activate up to 2 times per battle.)

15150.name: Lights On!
15150.desc: Every 20s: this ship points her lantern forward, illuminating enemies. Illuminated enemies suffer $1 reduced Evasion Rate for 10s.
15150.full: Every 20s: this ship points her lantern forward, illuminating enemies. Illuminated enemies suffer 10.0% reduced Evasion Rate for 10s.

15160.name: Let's Go, Data 857!
15160.desc: Every 20s: summons Data 857. When summoned, Data 857: 1) fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); 2) for 10s, increases this ship's ACC and Crit Rate by $2. During battle, increases the DMG your Allen M. Sumner-class ships deal to enemies that have been Illuminated at least twice by $4. After the first time this skill is activated, increases the DMG your Allen M. Sumner-class ships deal by $3 until the end of that battle.
15160.full: Every 20s: summons Data 857. When summoned, Data 857: 1) fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); 2) for 10s, increases this ship's ACC and Crit Rate by 15.0%. During battle, increases the DMG your Allen M. Sumner-class ships deal to enemies that have been Illuminated at least twice by 10.0%. After the first time this skill is activated, increases the DMG your Allen M. Sumner-class ships deal by 10.0% until the end of that battle.

15170.name: Star-Studded Formation
15170.desc: Every 8s: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When 4 same-colored shots in a row from this barrage hit the same enemy, one of the following debuffs are inflicted: 1) if the shots were black, the enemy's SPD is decreased by $2 for 2s; 2) if the shots were white, the enemy's DMG dealt is decreased by $3 for 2s.
15170.full: Every 8s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When 4 same-colored shots in a row from this barrage hit the same enemy, one of the following debuffs are inflicted: 1) if the shots were black, the enemy's SPD is decreased by 30.0% for 2s; 2) if the shots were white, the enemy's DMG dealt is decreased by 15.0% for 2s.

15180.name: Cunning Stratagem
15180.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). If your fleet consists entirely of Dragon Empery ships: improves this special airstrike, and once every 20s, 1 randomly chosen ship in your fleet deals $2 increased DMG for 5s.
15180.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). If your fleet consists entirely of Dragon Empery ships: improves this special airstrike, and once every 20s, 1 randomly chosen ship in your fleet deals 10.0% increased DMG for 5s.

15190.name: Azure Dragon's Dance
15190.desc: Provides 1 Missile Strike charge. Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases her Burn DMG taken by $1. Every 15s: fires a $2 special barrage that inflicts Armor Break for 6s to enemies (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).
15190.full: Provides 1 Missile Strike charge. Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases her Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts Armor Break for 6s to enemies (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).

15200.name: White Tiger's Prance
15200.desc: Provides 1 Missile Strike charge. Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases her Burn DMG taken by $1. Every 15s: fires a $2 special barrage that increases Torpedo DMG taken by 8.0% for 6s to enemies hit.
15200.full: Provides 1 Missile Strike charge. Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases her Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that increases Torpedo DMG taken by 8.0% for 6s to enemies hit.

15210.name: An Shan Name Ship+
15210.desc: Increases your An Shan-class ships' ACC, FP, and TRP by $1 and EVA by $2.
15210.full: Increases your An Shan-class ships' ACC, FP, and TRP by 25.0% and EVA by 10.0%.

15220.name: Mutual Assistance+
15220.desc: Increases FP, RLD, and ACC by $1 for all your Northern Parliament and Dragon Empery Vanguard ships, and increases FP, TRP, and AA by $2 for all your Northern Parliament and Dragon Empery Main Fleet ships.
15220.full: Increases FP, RLD, and ACC by 12.0% for all your Northern Parliament and Dragon Empery Vanguard ships, and increases FP, TRP, and AA by 12.0% for all your Northern Parliament and Dragon Empery Main Fleet ships.

15230.name: The Genius Mechanic
15230.desc:
Every 15s: $3 chance to deploy a smokescreen that increases Evasion Rate by $4 for all your ships in it (smokescreen lasts 5s; Evasion Rate buff does not stack with other smokescreen skills). 
While this ship is inside a smokescreen: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $1 and, once per battle, increases her LCK by $2 until the battle ends.
15230.full:
Every 15s: 30.0% chance to deploy a smokescreen that increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (smokescreen lasts 5s; Evasion Rate buff does not stack with other smokescreen skills). 
While this ship is inside a smokescreen: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0% and, once per battle, increases her LCK by 8 until the battle ends.

15240.name: Can I Attack Now?
15240.desc: 5s after the battle starts: fires a $1 special barrage; every 10s after that: fires an upgraded version of this barrage and also increases this ship's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by $2 (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; barrage upgrade effect and Crit-related effects can only activate up to 2 times per battle).
15240.full: 5s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage; every 10s after that: fires an upgraded version of this barrage and also increases this ship's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by 10.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; barrage upgrade effect and Crit-related effects can only activate up to 2 times per battle).

15250.name: Hang in There? Sure...
15250.desc: Increases this ship's ACC by $1. When the battle starts: 1) if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard, or there is 1 other Northern Parliament ship in your Vanguard: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $2; if this ship is your sole Vanguard ship: instead increases this ship's AA and EVA by $3.
15250.full: Increases this ship's ACC by 10.0%. When the battle starts: 1) if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard, or there is 1 other Northern Parliament ship in your Vanguard: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%; if this ship is your sole Vanguard ship: instead increases this ship's AA and EVA by 15.0%.

15260.name: Noble Strike
15260.desc: Every 15s: fires a $1 special barrage and increases the ACC of your Main Fleet by $2 for 8s (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).
15260.full: Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage and increases the ACC of your Main Fleet by 10.0% for 8s (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).

15270.name: Revenge Served Cold
15270.desc: For each Northern Parliament or Royal Navy ship in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times); if there are 3 or more: also increases this ship's AA by $2 and decreases her Burn DMG taken by $3.
15270.full: For each Northern Parliament or Royal Navy ship in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times); if there are 3 or more: also increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and decreases her Burn DMG taken by 10.0%.

15280.name: A Genius Keeps Things Simple!
15280.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to fire a $2 special barrage and, if there is at least 1 other DD originating from the Northern Parliament in your fleet: restores $1 HP of a randomly chosen DD originating from the Northern Parliament in your fleet (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; healing effect can only activate up to 2 times per battle; if the healing recipient is Tashkent, the amount of HP restored is increased by 50.0%).
15280.full: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage and, if there is at least 1 other DD originating from the Northern Parliament in your fleet: restores 5.0% HP of a randomly chosen DD originating from the Northern Parliament in your fleet (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; healing effect can only activate up to 2 times per battle; if the healing recipient is Tashkent, the amount of HP restored is increased by 50.0%).

15290.name: Indomitable Ice
15290.desc: Increases this ship's FP and EVA by $1. Every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if this ship has a large-caliber Main Gun equipped: decreases the shot requirement to 4 and improves this barrage).
15290.full: Increases this ship's FP and EVA by 8.0%. Every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if this ship has a large-caliber Main Gun equipped: decreases the shot requirement to 4 and improves this barrage).

15300.name: Tempered Prudence
15300.desc: Decreases the DMG this ship takes from AP ammo by $1. Every 4 times this ship fires her Secondary Guns: fires a $2 special barrage that decreases the FP of enemies hit by 5.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship equips Northern Parliament gear: increases this ship's Secondary Gun efficiency by $3 and, instead of reducing AP DMG taken, decreases all DMG taken by $1.
15300.full: Decreases the DMG this ship takes from AP ammo by 8.0%. Every 4 times this ship fires her Secondary Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that decreases the FP of enemies hit by 5.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship equips Northern Parliament gear: increases this ship's Secondary Gun efficiency by 45.0% and, instead of reducing AP DMG taken, decreases all DMG taken by 8.0%.

15310.name: Strong-Willed Support
15310.desc: During a battle, when this ship's HP falls below 10.0% as a result of DMG taken:decreases this ship's Burn DMG taken by 50.0% and recovers 1.0% of her max HP every second for $1s. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: 1) if that fleet's Flagship is a BB: decreases the Main Gun Spread of all your BBs by 2; 2) 20s after the battle starts: fires a $2 special barrage that decreases the SPD of enemies hit by 40.0% for 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15310.full: During a battle, when this ship's HP falls below 10.0% as a result of DMG taken:decreases this ship's Burn DMG taken by 50.0% and recovers 1.0% of her max HP every second for 10s. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: 1) if that fleet's Flagship is a BB: decreases the Main Gun Spread of all your BBs by 2; 2) 20s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that decreases the SPD of enemies hit by 40.0% for 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15320.name: Meteoric Hope
15320.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch an additional $2 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; inflicts the Flooding status for 12s to enemies hit by the special airstrike's torpedos). If this effect fails to activate: instead fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat).
15320.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 75.0% chance to launch an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; inflicts the Flooding status for 12s to enemies hit by the special airstrike's torpedos). If this effect fails to activate: instead fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat).

15330.name: Crystals of the Great River
15330.desc: Every 20s: selects the lowest HP percentage ship in your fleet, and afterwards 2 randomly chosen ships in your fleet, and recovers HP for the ship(s) equal to $1 of this ship's max HP (it is possible for a ship to receive multiple heals). After this effect activates: spawns a $2 summon that explodes, dealing DMG to enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat).
15330.full: Every 20s: selects the lowest HP percentage ship in your fleet, and afterwards 2 randomly chosen ships in your fleet, and recovers HP for the ship(s) equal to 5.0% of this ship's max HP (it is possible for a ship to receive multiple heals). After this effect activates: spawns a Lv.10 summon that explodes, dealing DMG to enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat).

15340.name: Motherly Heart
15340.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI by $1 per each ship in your Vanguard (can be stacked up to 3 times). If your Flagship or Vanguard lead ship is a Northern Parliament ship: grants this ship the full stack of 3 regardless of the number of ships in your Vanguard.
15340.full: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% per each ship in your Vanguard (can be stacked up to 3 times). If your Flagship or Vanguard lead ship is a Northern Parliament ship: grants this ship the full stack of 3 regardless of the number of ships in your Vanguard.

15360.name: Marvels of History - Seydlitz
15360.desc:
Every battle, the first time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $2 special barrage. 
When the battle starts, if this ship is NOT your Flagship and your Flagship has a "Marvels of History" skill: the higher percentage HP your Flagship has remaining, the shorter the reload time of her first Main Gun volley (at least 20.0%; up to $1).
15360.full:
Every battle, the first time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage. 
When the battle starts, if this ship is NOT your Flagship and your Flagship has a "Marvels of History" skill: the higher percentage HP your Flagship has remaining, the shorter the reload time of her first Main Gun volley (at least 20.0%; up to 80.0%).

15370.name: Impero is Brilliant
15370.desc:
Increases this ship's AVI by $5. 
Every 20s: $1 chance to launch a $2 special airstrike based on the type of aircraft equipped in this ship's first gear slot (DMG is based on the skill's level.) 
If the aircraft is a Fighter: decreases the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by $3; if it's a Dive Bomber, when this ship finishes loading her 2nd Airstrike: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $4 for 5s.
15370.full:
Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. 
Every 20s: 75.0% chance to launch a Lv.10 special airstrike based on the type of aircraft equipped in this ship's first gear slot (DMG is based on the skill's level.) 
If the aircraft is a Fighter: decreases the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 40.0%; if it's a Dive Bomber, when this ship finishes loading her 2nd Airstrike: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 60.0% for 5s.

15380.name: Impero is Charitable
15380.desc:
Increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2. 
10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that, while a ship in your Main Fleet has between 20.0% and 90.0% HP remaining: 
1) If this ship has the highest percentage HP of all ships in your Main Fleet, and there are at least 2 ships in your Main Fleet, deducts $1 HP from this ship and heals your Main Fleet ship with the lowest percentage HP (except this ship) for the amount of HP deducted from this ship; 
2) If this ship does NOT have the highest percentage HP, deducts $1 HP from your Main Fleet ship with the highest percentage HP and heals this ship for the amount of HP deducted from the other ship. 
Whichever ship is healed as a result of this skill has her EVA increased by $2 for 5s. If the ship healed is from the Sardegna Empire, the amount healed is increased by 183.
15380.full:
Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0%. 
10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that, while a ship in your Main Fleet has between 20.0% and 90.0% HP remaining: 
1) If this ship has the highest percentage HP of all ships in your Main Fleet, and there are at least 2 ships in your Main Fleet, deducts 5.0% HP from this ship and heals your Main Fleet ship with the lowest percentage HP (except this ship) for the amount of HP deducted from this ship; 
2) If this ship does NOT have the highest percentage HP, deducts 5.0% HP from your Main Fleet ship with the highest percentage HP and heals this ship for the amount of HP deducted from the other ship. 
Whichever ship is healed as a result of this skill has her EVA increased by 15.0% for 5s. If the ship healed is from the Sardegna Empire, the amount healed is increased by 183.

15390.name: March on Towards Triumph!
15390.desc: 5s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: spawns a special summon (lasts 15s; inflicts a unique Burn ailment to enemies) and decreases the ACC of all enemies by $1 for 5s.
15390.full: 5s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: spawns a special summon (lasts 15s; inflicts a unique Burn ailment to enemies) and decreases the ACC of all enemies by 20.0% for 5s.

15400.name: Tough Love
15400.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by $1. When the battle starts, if this ship is the frontmost ship of your Vanguard: restores $2 HP to this ship; if NOT in the frontmost position: decreases DMG taken by $3 for this ship and the frontmost ship of your Vanguard.
15400.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by 20.0%. When the battle starts, if this ship is the frontmost ship of your Vanguard: restores 5.0% HP to this ship; if NOT in the frontmost position: decreases DMG taken by 10.0% for this ship and the frontmost ship of your Vanguard.

15410.name: With Victory Comes Glory!
15410.desc: During a sortie, for each enemy fleet sunk by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's DMG dealt with torpedoes based on her proximity to the enemy at the time of firing (the closer she is, the more DMG they deal, up to a maximum of $2 when within 10 units or less).
15410.full: During a sortie, for each enemy fleet sunk by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's DMG dealt with torpedoes based on her proximity to the enemy at the time of firing (the closer she is, the more DMG they deal, up to a maximum of 15.0% when within 10 units or less).

15420.name: Iron-Willed Leader
15420.desc:
When the battle starts, if there are 2 or more Iron Blood ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and RLD by $1. 
When the battle starts, the higher percentage HP this ship has remaining, the shorter the reload time of her first Main Gun volley (at least 20.0%; up to $2). 
During each battle, this ship will tank $3 of all DMG received by your Iron Blood Main Fleet ships, and the DMG tanked is reduced by $4 (this effect becomes inactive after the primary effect of the skill "Unsinkable Legend" activates).
15420.full:
When the battle starts, if there are 2 or more Iron Blood ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 18.0%. 
When the battle starts, the higher percentage HP this ship has remaining, the shorter the reload time of her first Main Gun volley (at least 20.0%; up to 80.0%). 
During each battle, this ship will tank 60.0% of all DMG received by your Iron Blood Main Fleet ships, and the DMG tanked is reduced by 20.0% (this effect becomes inactive after the primary effect of the skill "Unsinkable Legend" activates).

15430.name: Unsinkable Legend
15430.desc:
Once per battle, when this ship takes DMG that would sink her: this ship does not sink, she evades all attacks for 10s, and she recovers $1 of her max HP; after this effect activates, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% until the battle ends. 
The higher percentage HP this ship has remaining, the more DMG she deals, up to $2 more; the lower percentage HP she has remaining, the less DMG she takes, up to $2 less (this effect does not modify DMG tanked as a result of the skill "Iron-Willed Leader").
15430.full:
Once per battle, when this ship takes DMG that would sink her: this ship does not sink, she evades all attacks for 10s, and she recovers 22.0% of her max HP; after this effect activates, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% until the battle ends. 
The higher percentage HP this ship has remaining, the more DMG she deals, up to 20.0% more; the lower percentage HP she has remaining, the less DMG she takes, up to 20.0% less (this effect does not modify DMG tanked as a result of the skill "Iron-Willed Leader").

15440.name: Providential Starfall
15440.desc: When this ship finishes loading her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When an enemy is hit by this barrage's blue shells, for 10s: decreases that enemy's EVA by 8.0% and increases their DMG taken by your Iron Blood ships by $3.
15440.full: When this ship finishes loading her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When an enemy is hit by this barrage's blue shells, for 10s: decreases that enemy's EVA by 8.0% and increases their DMG taken by your Iron Blood ships by 12.0%.

15450.name: Marvels of History - Thüringen
15450.desc: If this ship has an Iron Blood Secondary Weapon equipped, when she fires her Secondary Weapon: $1 chance to fire a follow-up attack. 10s cooldown between activations.
15450.full: If this ship has an Iron Blood Secondary Weapon equipped, when she fires her Secondary Weapon: 70.0% chance to fire a follow-up attack. 10s cooldown between activations.

15460.name: Bravery at Skagerrak
15460.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun DMG by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a $3 frontal barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15460.full: Increases this ship's Main Gun DMG by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 frontal barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15470.name: The Hunt is On
15470.desc: Every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times; the final stack additionally increases RLD by $2).
15470.full: Every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and ACC by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times; the final stack additionally increases RLD by 15.0%).

15480.name: Marvels of History - Lützow

15490.name: Devotion to Precision
15490.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. When this ship attacks an enemy DD, her ACC further increases by $2.
15490.full: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. When this ship attacks an enemy DD, her ACC further increases by 10.0%.

15500.name: Marvels of History - Yorck
15500.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by $1. Every 20s, deploys a shield (can block up to 3 enemy torpedoes, lasts 20s).
15500.full: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 20s, deploys a shield (can block up to 3 enemy torpedoes, lasts 20s).

15510.name: Duet of Alternation
15510.desc: If Emden has a CL Main Gun equipped in the Secondary Weapon slot: increases Emden's Main Gun and Secondary Weapon Efficiencies by $1 and, once every 20s, fires a $2 special barrage that inflicts a minus 30.0% SPD debuff to enemies hit for 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level); if a DD Main Gun is equipped in this slot instead: every 10s, deploys a shield that lasts 5s and can block up to 5 enemy shots. If this shield is destroyed rather than expiring: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that restores Emden's HP equal to $3 of the DMG dealt.
15510.full: If Emden has a CL Main Gun equipped in the Secondary Weapon slot: increases Emden's Main Gun and Secondary Weapon Efficiencies by 25.0% and, once every 20s, fires a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts a minus 30.0% SPD debuff to enemies hit for 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level); if a DD Main Gun is equipped in this slot instead: every 10s, deploys a shield that lasts 5s and can block up to 5 enemy shots. If this shield is destroyed rather than expiring: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that restores Emden's HP equal to 15.0% of the DMG dealt.

15520.name: Marvels of History - Emden(?)
15520.desc:
When the battle starts, increases your Emden's EVA by $1 and: 
1) If your Vanguard consists of only Emden, Emden is unaffected by the Out of Ammo debuff; 
2) If there are other Iron Blood ships in your fleet, after 5s, lowers your Iron Blood ships' HP by 11 and increases their FP by $3. 
Every battle, when Emden sinks an enemy: increases Emden's EVA by $2 (can be stacked up to 3 times).
15520.full:
When the battle starts, increases your Emden's EVA by 10.0% and: 
1) If your Vanguard consists of only Emden, Emden is unaffected by the Out of Ammo debuff; 
2) If there are other Iron Blood ships in your fleet, after 5s, lowers your Iron Blood ships' HP by 11 and increases their FP by 10.0%. 
Every battle, when Emden sinks an enemy: increases Emden's EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

15530.name: I Won't Hit Anyway...
15530.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by $1. Every 5 times this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's FP and AA by $2 (can be stacked up to 3 times; if an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range, instantly gain the max stack).
15530.full: When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%. Every 5 times this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times; if an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range, instantly gain the max stack).

15540.name: Shields! More Shields!

15560.name: Marvels of History - Elbing
15560.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by $1. When this ship fires her Torpedoes: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if there are enemies within 30 units of this ship, the barrage uses the HE attribute; if there are none, the barrage uses the AP attribute).
15560.full: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Torpedoes: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if there are enemies within 30 units of this ship, the barrage uses the HE attribute; if there are none, the barrage uses the AP attribute).

15570.name: Please Take Care
15570.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ASW by $1. 20s after the battle starts: restores $2 max HP to all ships in your Vanguard. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: increases your Royal Navy DDs' ASW, FP, and TRP by $1.
15570.full: Increases this ship's FP and ASW by 10.0%. 20s after the battle starts: restores 5.0% max HP to all ships in your Vanguard. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: increases your Royal Navy DDs' ASW, FP, and TRP by 10.0%.

15580.name: Lucky Jervis
15580.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from aircraft by $1. When the battle starts, if your Vanguard consists of only DDs and/or CLs: increases this ship's TRP by $1 and decreases her torpedo DMG taken by $2. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and this ship is in the frontmost position: when this ship takes DMG, 15.0% chance to increase this ship's Evasion Rate by $3 for 10s (20s cooldown between activations).
15580.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if your Vanguard consists of only DDs and/or CLs: increases this ship's TRP by 10.0% and decreases her torpedo DMG taken by 20.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and this ship is in the frontmost position: when this ship takes DMG, 15.0% chance to increase this ship's Evasion Rate by 30.0% for 10s (20s cooldown between activations).

15590.name: Throwing Down the Gauntlet
15590.desc: Increases this ship's AA and EVA by $1. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: increases this ship's AA Gun Efficiency by $2 and increases your Royal Navy DDs' AA by $2.
15590.full: Increases this ship's AA and EVA by 20.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: increases this ship's AA Gun Efficiency by 15.0% and increases your Royal Navy DDs' AA by 15.0%.

15600.name: A Surprise for Mew!
15600.desc: 3s after the battle starts, and every 15s after that: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; when this barrage fires, increases this ship's AA by $2 for 10s).
15600.full: 3s after the battle starts, and every 15s after that: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; when this barrage fires, increases this ship's AA by 15.0% for 10s).

15610.name: Nine Lives
15610.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first wave of torpedoes by $1. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores $2 of this ship's max HP.
15610.full: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first wave of torpedoes by 40.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

15620.name: One Iota of Effort
15620.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 special airstrike that inflicts a special Burn to enemies hit by it (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level; Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat).
15620.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike that inflicts a special Burn to enemies hit by it (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level; Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat).

15630.name: Two Can Play at That Game
15630.desc: 10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: launches a $1 special airstrike that inflicts a special Burn to enemies hit by it (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level; Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat). When this ship's aircraft shoot down an enemy aircraft: decreases your ships' DMG taken from aircraft by $2 for 10s (20s cooldown between activations).
15630.full: 10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike that inflicts a special Burn to enemies hit by it (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level; Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat). When this ship's aircraft shoot down an enemy aircraft: decreases your ships' DMG taken from aircraft by 15.0% for 10s (20s cooldown between activations).

15640.name: Together We Shine Brighter

15650.name: Revengeful Strike
15650.desc: Every 15s: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage that inflicts a special Armor Break debuff to enemies hit for 8s (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15650.full: Every 15s: 50% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts a special Armor Break debuff to enemies hit for 8s (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15660.name: Trajectory Recalibration
15660.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1. If this ship is not your Flagship, and your Flagship is a BB or BC: when this ship fires her Main Guns, this ship's volleys will fire from the Flagship position.
15660.full: Increases this ship's FP by 10.0%. If this ship is not your Flagship, and your Flagship is a BB or BC: when this ship fires her Main Guns, this ship's volleys will fire from the Flagship position.

15670.name: Yuni's Aid
15670.desc: This ship starts the battle with 1 Airstrike loaded. When this ship launches an Airstrike: restores $1 max HP to every ship in your Vanguard; the first time this effect activates every battle, it also restores $2 max HP to every ship in your Main Fleet, and after that, restores $3 max HP to the lowest percentage HP ship in your Main Fleet.
15670.full: This ship starts the battle with 1 Airstrike loaded. When this ship launches an Airstrike: restores 8.0% max HP to every ship in your Vanguard; the first time this effect activates every battle, it also restores 5.0% max HP to every ship in your Main Fleet, and after that, restores 3.0% max HP to the lowest percentage HP ship in your Main Fleet.

15680.name: Glisten, Light of Glory!
15680.desc: When this ship finishes loading her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and, for 6s, increase your BBs' and BCs' DMG dealt by $2.
15680.full: When this ship finishes loading her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and, for 6s, increase your BBs' and BCs' DMG dealt by 8.0%.

15690.name: Scatter, Minions of Darkness!
15690.desc:
Increases this ship's ACC by $1 and RLD by $2. During battle, 2s after an enemy spawns in: increases the enemy's DMG taken from your ships by $3. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: 
1) Increases FP by $3 for all Royal Navy ships in that Vanguard Fleet; 2) 30s after the battle starts: fires a special barrage and, for 15s, increases AA by $3 for all ships in that fleet.
15690.full:
Increases this ship's ACC by 12.0% and RLD by 20.0%. During battle, 2s after an enemy spawns in: increases the enemy's DMG taken from your ships by 10.0%. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: 
1) Increases FP by 10.0% for all Royal Navy ships in that Vanguard Fleet; 2) 30s after the battle starts: fires a special barrage and, for 15s, increases AA by 10.0% for all ships in that fleet.

15700.name: Behold, My Royal Sabre!
15700.desc: This ship's Secondary Guns always deal Critical Hits. If this ship has Royal Navy gear equipped: increases this ship's AA Gun Efficiency by $1 and decreases your Flagship's Main Gun Spread by 2. When the battle starts, if there is at least 1 other Royal Navy ship in your fleet: decreases all your Royal Navy ships' DMG taken from aircraft by $2.
15700.full: This ship's Secondary Guns always deal Critical Hits. If this ship has Royal Navy gear equipped: increases this ship's AA Gun Efficiency by 30.0% and decreases your Flagship's Main Gun Spread by 2. When the battle starts, if there is at least 1 other Royal Navy ship in your fleet: decreases all your Royal Navy ships' DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%.

15720.name: Sacraments of Illusion
15720.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt by $1. When this ship launches an Airstrike: if this ship is above your Flagship on the battle screen, launches a $2 special airstrike with fighter planes; if this ship is below your Flagship, launches a $2 special airstrike with torpedo bombers (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level).
15720.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: if this ship is above your Flagship on the battle screen, launches a Lv.10 special airstrike with fighter planes; if this ship is below your Flagship, launches a Lv.10 special airstrike with torpedo bombers (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level).

15730.name: Black Plumes of Judgment
15730.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by $1. When this ship attacks an enemy with 25.0% or less max HP left: increases this ship's Crit Rate by $3 and Crit DMG by $4 against that enemy. When this ship launches an Airstrike, if there is an enemy with 25.0% or less max HP left on the screen: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15730.full: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. When this ship attacks an enemy with 25.0% or less max HP left: increases this ship's Crit Rate by 20.0% and Crit DMG by 25.0% against that enemy. When this ship launches an Airstrike, if there is an enemy with 25.0% or less max HP left on the screen: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15740.name: Vichya's Black Lance
15740.desc: Every 5s: performs a $1 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases this ship's FP and TRP by $2 (can be stacked up to 3 times). When an enemy is hit by this attack: increases that enemy's cannon and torpedo DMG taken from L'Indomptable by $3 (does not stack). Every 4 times this attack is performed: fires a $4 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Once per battle, when this barrage is fired: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $5 until the end of the battle.
15740.full: Every 5s: performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases this ship's FP and TRP by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). When an enemy is hit by this attack: increases that enemy's cannon and torpedo DMG taken from L'Indomptable by 15.0% (does not stack). Every 4 times this attack is performed: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Once per battle, when this barrage is fired: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0% until the end of the battle.

15750.name: I Will Not Yield!

15770.name: Time to Clean
15770.desc: Increases this ship's equipped torpedo DMG dealt by $1 and increases her DMG dealt to DDs and Torpedo Ships by $2.
15770.full: Increases this ship's equipped torpedo DMG dealt by 15.0% and increases her DMG dealt to DDs and Torpedo Ships by 15.0%.

15780.name: Equipment Level-Upper!
15780.desc: Increases this boat's TRP and ACC by $2, and DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by $1. If this boat has Sardegna Empire gear equipped: further increases this boat's TRP and ACC by $2.
15780.full: Increases this boat's TRP and ACC by 10.0%, and DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by 15.0%. If this boat has Sardegna Empire gear equipped: further increases this boat's TRP and ACC by 10.0%.

15790.name: Get 'Em, Canguro!
15790.desc: 3s after entering the battle: this boat stops moving and summons Canguro. Canguro moves forward a set distance and deploys sea mines (sea mines inflict Flooding to enemies that touch them, continuously dealing DMG for 24s; Flooding DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat; Flooding cannot stack), then returns to this boat. After this boat retrieves Canguro, she resumes moving and fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15790.full: 3s after entering the battle: this boat stops moving and summons Canguro. Canguro moves forward a set distance and deploys sea mines (sea mines inflict Flooding to enemies that touch them, continuously dealing DMG for 24s; Flooding DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat; Flooding cannot stack), then returns to this boat. After this boat retrieves Canguro, she resumes moving and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15800.name: Halo of Fervor
15800.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by $1 for 60s. 3s after the battle starts, and with a $3 chance every 20s: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15800.full: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 15.0% for 60s. 3s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15810.name: Easygoing Composure
15810.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against DDs and CLs by $2. 20s after the battle starts: decreases the loading time of this ship's mid-reload torpedoes by 20s, then increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2 and decreases her DMG taken by $1, but decreases her SPD by 8.
15810.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against DDs and CLs by 15.0%. 20s after the battle starts: decreases the loading time of this ship's mid-reload torpedoes by 20s, then increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 6.0%, but decreases her SPD by 8.

15820.name: Knock It Off...!
15820.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by $1. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to deploy 2 shields that block $2 enemy torpedoes (shields last 10s; 20s cooldown between activations). Once per battle, when this ship falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: restores $3 of this ship's max HP.
15820.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by 20.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to deploy 2 shields that block 2 enemy torpedoes (shields last 10s; 20s cooldown between activations). Once per battle, when this ship falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

15830.name: Fleet-Footed Firing
15830.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's EVA by $2 for 2s.
15830.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by 20.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 2s.

15840.name: Inheritor's Will
15840.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this barrage fails to activate, that salvo deals $2 increased DMG and slows enemies hit by $3 for 5s (does not stack).
15840.full: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this barrage fails to activate, that salvo deals 20.0% increased DMG and slows enemies hit by 30.0% for 5s (does not stack).

15850.name: Veni, Vidi, Vici
15850.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. When the battle starts, and every 20s: performs a sonar scan that reveals enemy SSs for 8s. Every 10s, and every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by $2 (can be stacked up to 3 times).
15850.full: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. When the battle starts, and every 20s: performs a sonar scan that reveals enemy SSs for 8s. Every 10s, and every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

15860.name: Exalted Light
15860.desc: Decreases the enemy's TRP by $1 while this ship is afloat. If there are 3 or more Sardegna Empire ships in your fleet: decreases the loading time of this ship's first Main Gun volley by 30.0%.
15860.full: Decreases the enemy's TRP by 8.0% while this ship is afloat. If there are 3 or more Sardegna Empire ships in your fleet: decreases the loading time of this ship's first Main Gun volley by 30.0%.

15870.name: Frontline Scoop
15870.desc: If this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1. 10s after the battle starts, and with a $2 chance every 20s after that: throws a flare (lasts 10s; prioritizes throwing flare at the enemy closest to this ship) that decreases the Evasion Rate of all enemies in its range by 25.0%. This ship deals $3 increased DMG against enemies affected by this flare.
15870.full: If this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0%. 10s after the battle starts, and with a 40.0% chance every 20s after that: throws a flare (lasts 10s; prioritizes throwing flare at the enemy closest to this ship) that decreases the Evasion Rate of all enemies in its range by 25.0%. This ship deals 15.0% increased DMG against enemies affected by this flare.

15880.name: Paparazza's Retreat
15880.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by $1 for 5s. Once per battle, when this ship or a Sardegna Empire ship in your Vanguard falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: deploys a smokescreen (lasts 5s) that increases Evasion Rate by $2 for all your ships in it (does not stack with other smokescreen skills).
15880.full: Every 20s after the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 5s. Once per battle, when this ship or a Sardegna Empire ship in your Vanguard falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: deploys a smokescreen (lasts 5s) that increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (does not stack with other smokescreen skills).

15890.name: Lookout's Courage
15890.desc: When this ship takes DMG: increases this ship's AA and EVA by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times). Each sortie, for the first 3 battles fought by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $2.
15890.full: When this ship takes DMG: increases this ship's AA and EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). Each sortie, for the first 3 battles fought by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

15900.name: Lookout's Support
15900.desc: Once per battle, when any other ship in your Vanguard falls below 20.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: decreases that ship's DMG taken by $1 for 8s. When any other ship in your fleet sinks: restores $2 of this ship's max HP.
15900.full: Once per battle, when any other ship in your Vanguard falls below 20.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: decreases that ship's DMG taken by 50.0% for 8s. When any other ship in your fleet sinks: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

15910.name: Beavers, Assemble!
15910.desc: When sortied with Thatcher, Aulick, Foote, Spence, or a DD with the Beaver Squad Tag equipped: increases this ship's Crit Rate and DMG dealt by $1; when the HP of one of the aforementioned ships in your fleet falls below 25.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores $2 of that ship's HP (can only activate once per battle per eligible ship). Every 10s: $3 chance to fire a $4 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
15910.full: When sortied with Thatcher, Aulick, Foote, Spence, or a DD with the Beaver Squad Tag equipped: increases this ship's Crit Rate and DMG dealt by 15.0%; when the HP of one of the aforementioned ships in your fleet falls below 25.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 20.0% of that ship's HP (can only activate once per battle per eligible ship). Every 10s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15920.name: The Best Mines Ever!
15920.desc: The first 4 times this ship fires her torpedoes every battle, this ship deploys $1 sea mines at her present location (sea mine DMG is based on the skill's level). When sortied with Admiral Hipper, or if there is an enemy Royal Navy CL present: increases this ship's SPD by 3.
15920.full: The first 4 times this ship fires her torpedoes every battle, this ship deploys Lv.10 sea mines at her present location (sea mine DMG is based on the skill's level). When sortied with Admiral Hipper, or if there is an enemy Royal Navy CL present: increases this ship's SPD by 3.

15930.name: Daredevil Sweetheart
15930.desc: Increases this ship's FP and Crit Rate by $1 and SPD by $2. 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level), and, for 8s, tanks 30.0% of the rest of your Vanguard's DMG taken while decreasing it by $4. During battle, this ship gains a $3 special Secondary Gun (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AA stat).
15930.full: Increases this ship's FP and Crit Rate by 15.0% and SPD by 8. 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level), and, for 8s, tanks 30.0% of the rest of your Vanguard's DMG taken while decreasing it by 20.0%. During battle, this ship gains a Lv.10 special Secondary Gun (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AA stat).

15940.name: Unstoppable Love
15940.desc: Every 30s after the battle starts: deploys 2 rotating shields (last $1s; can block up to 10 enemy shells). Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by $2 and, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $3 (does not affect DMG tanked by this ship's "Daredevil Sweetheart" skill) and increases her DMG dealt by $2.
15940.full: Every 30s after the battle starts: deploys 2 rotating shields (last 15s; can block up to 10 enemy shells). Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 10.0% and, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% (does not affect DMG tanked by this ship's "Daredevil Sweetheart" skill) and increases her DMG dealt by 10.0%.

15950.name: Urd's Fate-Piercer
15950.desc: When this ship's Main Guns finish loading: performs a $1 special attack that inflicts a minus 40.0% SPD debuff for 6s to enemies hit, after which there is a $2 chance to fire a $1 special barrage (special attack and barrage DMG are based on the skill's level). If this ship has an HE Main Gun equipped, or if there is another Iron Blood ship in your fleet when the battle starts: increases the above barrage's activation chance by 20.0%.
15950.full: When this ship's Main Guns finish loading: performs a Lv.10 special attack that inflicts a minus 40.0% SPD debuff for 6s to enemies hit, after which there is a 80.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (special attack and barrage DMG are based on the skill's level). If this ship has an HE Main Gun equipped, or if there is another Iron Blood ship in your fleet when the battle starts: increases the above barrage's activation chance by 20.0%.

15960.name: Pantheon of War
15960.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Main Fleet: increases the ACC of your BBs, BCs, and BBVs by $2. If this ship has Iron Blood gear equipped: increases this ship's DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by $3.
15960.full: Increases this ship's FP by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Main Fleet: increases the ACC of your BBs, BCs, and BBVs by 10.0%. If this ship has Iron Blood gear equipped: increases this ship's DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by 15.0%.

15970.name: Keeping You On Your Toes♪
15970.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by $1. Once per battle, when this ship takes DMG totaling more than 5.0% of her max HP from one hit: deploys a shield around this ship that can negate up to $2 of this ship's max HP in DMG; if this shield is destroyed: increases this ship's EVA and DMG dealt by $3 until the battle ends.
15970.full: Increases this ship's TRP by 20.0%. Once per battle, when this ship takes DMG totaling more than 5.0% of her max HP from one hit: deploys a shield around this ship that can negate up to 10.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG; if this shield is destroyed: increases this ship's EVA and DMG dealt by 15.0% until the battle ends.

15980.name: Adaptive Bladework
15980.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by $1. When the battle starts, and every 20s: 1) Once per battle, if this ship's HP is below 25.0%: restores $2 of this ship's max HP; 2) If this ship's HP is above 25.0%: fires a $4 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases this ship's Crit Rate by $3 for 15s; 3) If this ship has sunk 3 or more enemy ships in the battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 for 15s.
15980.full: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 20.0%. When the battle starts, and every 20s: 1) Once per battle, if this ship's HP is below 25.0%: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP; 2) If this ship's HP is above 25.0%: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases this ship's Crit Rate by 15.0% for 15s; 3) If this ship has sunk 3 or more enemy ships in the battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0% for 15s.

15990.name: This Time... I'm Prepared
15990.desc: When a ship in your Vanguard rams into an enemy: decreases that ship's DMG taken by $1 and increases your Vanguard's FP and ACC by $2 for 10s (does not stack; repeat activations only refresh the buff's duration). When the battle starts, and every 10s: this ship and the Vanguard ship(s) adjacent to her take 6 DMG, and for 3s, their EVA is increased by $2.
15990.full: When a ship in your Vanguard rams into an enemy: decreases that ship's DMG taken by 25.0% and increases your Vanguard's FP and ACC by 10.0% for 10s (does not stack; repeat activations only refresh the buff's duration). When the battle starts, and every 10s: this ship and the Vanguard ship(s) adjacent to her take 6 DMG, and for 3s, their EVA is increased by 10.0%.

16000.name: Swallow's Sword-Dance
16000.desc: Every 10s: increases this ship's FP and AA by $1 and fires a $2 special barrage that penetrates enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level; FP and AA buff can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's DMG dealt to enemies hit by this barrage's slash attack by $3 and decreases this ship's cannon and torpedo DMG taken from those enemies by $3.
16000.full: Every 10s: increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% and fires a Lv.10 special barrage that penetrates enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level; FP and AA buff can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's DMG dealt to enemies hit by this barrage's slash attack by 10.0% and decreases this ship's cannon and torpedo DMG taken from those enemies by 10.0%.

16010.name: Imperturbable Heart
16010.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's ASW by $1 and grants this ship a special $2 ASW weapon (DMG is based on the skill's level). Every 15s: performs a sonar scan that renders enemy SSs detected for 8s. When sortied with an Akizuki-class DD: increases this ship's EVA by $1. Once per battle, when a ship in your Vanguard falls below 30.0% HP as a result of DMG taken: that ship evades all attacks for 2s and gains a shield that can block up to $3 of Wakatsuki's max HP in DMG.
16010.full: When the battle starts: increases this ship's ASW by 15.0% and grants this ship a special Lv.10 ASW weapon (DMG is based on the skill's level). Every 15s: performs a sonar scan that renders enemy SSs detected for 8s. When sortied with an Akizuki-class DD: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%. Once per battle, when a ship in your Vanguard falls below 30.0% HP as a result of DMG taken: that ship evades all attacks for 2s and gains a shield that can block up to 6.0% of Wakatsuki's max HP in DMG.

16020.name: Martyr+
16020.desc: Once when the battle starts, and with a $2 chance when this ship takes DMG: fires a $3 special barrage that restores 1.0% max HP to each ship in your Vanguard (DMG is based on the skill's level; 18s cooldown between activations). When this ship sinks: 1) Outside of an Exercise, restores $1 max HP to all other ships in your fleet; 2) During an Exercise: this ship instead will not sink, and restores $1 max HP to all ships in your fleet (can only activate once per battle; if the Eagle Union Elite Damage Control is also equipped, the effects from this skill take precedence).
16020.full: Once when the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance when this ship takes DMG: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that restores 1.0% max HP to each ship in your Vanguard (DMG is based on the skill's level; 18s cooldown between activations). When this ship sinks: 1) Outside of an Exercise, restores 25.0% max HP to all other ships in your fleet; 2) During an Exercise: this ship instead will not sink, and restores 25.0% max HP to all ships in your fleet (can only activate once per battle; if the Eagle Union Elite Damage Control is also equipped, the effects from this skill take precedence).

16030.name: Violet Lightning Storm
16030.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship has a Sakura Empire Main Gun equipped, this barrage is improved. This special barrage has 50.0% increased Crit Rate, and the lightning bolts from this barrage inflict a special Armor Break ailment to enemies hit, increasing their DMG taken by 5.0% for 8s; if the enemy hit has Heavy Armor, the Armor Break ailment is increased to 10.0% instead.
16030.full: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship has a Sakura Empire Main Gun equipped, this barrage is improved. This special barrage has 50.0% increased Crit Rate, and the lightning bolts from this barrage inflict a special Armor Break ailment to enemies hit, increasing their DMG taken by 5.0% for 8s; if the enemy hit has Heavy Armor, the Armor Break ailment is increased to 10.0% instead.

16040.name: Tempestuous Blade
16040.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1 and ACC by $2. If this ship has Sakura Empire gear equipped: increases this ship's RLD by $3 and Main Gun Crit DMG by $4.
16040.full: Increases this ship's FP by 20.0% and ACC by 5.0%. If this ship has Sakura Empire gear equipped: increases this ship's RLD by 10.0% and Main Gun Crit DMG by 15.0%.

16050.name: Musashi's Guardianship
16050.desc:
When the battle starts, if this ship is NOT your Flagship OR your Airspace Control status is not Air Incapability or Air Denial: reduces this ship's DMG taken by $1 in that battle.
If this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in enters a battle: fires a $2 supporting barrage 15s and 35s after the battle starts (DMG is based on the skill's level).
[Non-Exercise Only] While this ship is above 40.0% HP: grants the "Musashi's Guardianship" status to all your other Main Fleet ships. Ships with this status: 1) No longer take Ramming DMG; 2) Force Musashi to become Detected as well if they become Detected; 3) Cause Musashi to be prioritized by enemy attacks if they are both valid targets.
16050.full:
When the battle starts, if this ship is NOT your Flagship OR your Airspace Control status is not Air Incapability or Air Denial: reduces this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% in that battle.
If this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in enters a battle: fires a Lv.10 supporting barrage 15s and 35s after the battle starts (DMG is based on the skill's level).
[Non-Exercise Only] While this ship is above 40.0% HP: grants the "Musashi's Guardianship" status to all your other Main Fleet ships. Ships with this status: 1) No longer take Ramming DMG; 2) Force Musashi to become Detected as well if they become Detected; 3) Cause Musashi to be prioritized by enemy attacks if they are both valid targets.

16070.name: Plumes of Darkest Night
16070.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to DDs and CLs by $1. Every 15s: $2 chance to fire a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if this effect fails to activate, this ship instead restores 3.0% of her max HP).
16070.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to DDs and CLs by 15.0%. Every 15s: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if this effect fails to activate, this ship instead restores 3.0% of her max HP).

16080.name: Follow the Trends
16080.desc: When this ship hits an enemy with a torpedo: increases this ship's EVA by $1 for 10s. When your Vanguard ships take DMG a total of 10 times, decreases this ship's LCK by 5 and the DMG taken by your Vanguard by $2 until the battle ends.
16080.full: When this ship hits an enemy with a torpedo: increases this ship's EVA by 10.0% for 10s. When your Vanguard ships take DMG a total of 10 times, decreases this ship's LCK by 5 and the DMG taken by your Vanguard by 10.0% until the battle ends.

16090.name: Metal Gauntlet Mash!
16090.desc: Every 15s after the battle starts: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemy DDs and CLs hit by this barrage suffer the Armor Break debuff for 6s.
16090.full: Every 15s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemy DDs and CLs hit by this barrage suffer the Armor Break debuff for 6s.

16100.name: For My Friends!
16100.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $1 for each afloat ship in your Vanguard. While at least 1 ship in your Vanguard has 50.0% or less max HP remaining: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2.
16100.full: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 5.0% for each afloat ship in your Vanguard. While at least 1 ship in your Vanguard has 50.0% or less max HP remaining: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 10.0%.

16110.name: Pl-Please Take Care
16110.desc: Increases this ship's FP, TRP, and ASW by $1. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: deploys a barrier (lasts 20s; can negate DMG equal to up to $2 of the recipient's max HP) around your Royal Navy DD(s); if the barrier is destroyed or expires, decreases the barrier recipient's DMG taken by $1 for 20s. When sortied with another J-class DD: increases your J-class DDs' FP, TRP, and ACC by $1.
16110.full: Increases this ship's FP, TRP, and ASW by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: deploys a barrier (lasts 20s; can negate DMG equal to up to 5.0% of the recipient's max HP) around your Royal Navy DD(s); if the barrier is destroyed or expires, decreases the barrier recipient's DMG taken by 10.0% for 20s. When sortied with another J-class DD: increases your J-class DDs' FP, TRP, and ACC by 10.0%.

16120.name: Charming Janus
16120.desc: Every 15s after the battle starts: $2 chance to fire a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by this barrage take 12.0% increased DMG from your DDs and CLs for 5s (does not stack). If this barrage does not activate, instead performs a sonar scan that renders enemy SSs detected for 8s.
16120.full: Every 15s after the battle starts: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by this barrage take 12.0% increased DMG from your DDs and CLs for 5s (does not stack). If this barrage does not activate, instead performs a sonar scan that renders enemy SSs detected for 8s.

16130.name: Multitasking Maid
16130.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. When this ship fires her torpedoes: 50.0% chance to inflict 15 DMG to this ship and fire an additional Main Gun volley.
16130.full: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 10.0%. When this ship fires her torpedoes: 50.0% chance to inflict 15 DMG to this ship and fire an additional Main Gun volley.

16140.name: Premature Gift
16140.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's 1st wave of torpedoes by $1, but decreases the DMG dealt by this wave by $2. When this ship takes DMG from a torpedo: 75.0% chance to restore 1.0% of this ship's max HP once every second for 8s (this effect can only activate once per battle; this HP recovery effect will be interrupted if this ship's "Multitasking Maid" skill activates during it).
16140.full: Decreases the loading time of this ship's 1st wave of torpedoes by 70.0%, but decreases the DMG dealt by this wave by 30.0%. When this ship takes DMG from a torpedo: 75.0% chance to restore 1.0% of this ship's max HP once every second for 8s (this effect can only activate once per battle; this HP recovery effect will be interrupted if this ship's "Multitasking Maid" skill activates during it).

16150.name: Skyraiders, Advance!
16150.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: 1) launches a recon squadron consisting of Skyraider AEW planes, detecting enemy SSs for 6s. Additionally, selects 1 enemy at random (humanoid enemies are prioritized) and increases this ship's DMG dealt to that enemy by $1 (does not stack); 2) launches a $2 special airstrike that can hit enemy SSs (DMG is based on the skill's level).
16150.full: When this ship launches an airstrike: 1) launches a recon squadron consisting of Skyraider AEW planes, detecting enemy SSs for 6s. Additionally, selects 1 enemy at random (humanoid enemies are prioritized) and increases this ship's DMG dealt to that enemy by 10.0% (does not stack); 2) launches a Lv.10 special airstrike that can hit enemy SSs (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16160.name: Unblemished White Cliffs
16160.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by $1; if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet, further increases this ship's AVI and AA by $2.
16160.full: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%; if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet, further increases this ship's AVI and AA by 10.0%.

16170.name: Guardian Faerie
16170.desc: Increases your Main Fleet's maximum Detection Gauge value by 10. As long as this ship is afloat: 1) decreases your Main Fleet's Burn DMG taken by $1; 2) when a ship in your Vanguard recovers HP, 50.0% of any excess HP recovered beyond the maximum is converted into a barrier that can negate DMG equal to that amount, lasting up to 5s; 3) while this barrier is active, the barrier's recipient deals $2 increased DMG.
16170.full: Increases your Main Fleet's maximum Detection Gauge value by 10. As long as this ship is afloat: 1) decreases your Main Fleet's Burn DMG taken by 15.0%; 2) when a ship in your Vanguard recovers HP, 50.0% of any excess HP recovered beyond the maximum is converted into a barrier that can negate DMG equal to that amount, lasting up to 5s; 3) while this barrier is active, the barrier's recipient deals 5.0% increased DMG.

16180.name: Tempesta Pact
16180.desc: When this ship enters the battle, and every 20s after that: performs a $1 special attack that slows enemies hit by 40.0% for 6s (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2 for 30s after entering the battle.
16180.full: When this ship enters the battle, and every 20s after that: performs a Lv.10 special attack that slows enemies hit by 40.0% for 6s (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 30.0% for 30s after entering the battle.

16190.name: Guardian of the Deep
16190.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 and increases her FP by $2. When this ship enters the battle: restores $3 of this ship's max HP. 5s after this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken, or 60s after she enters the battle: this ship leaves the battle.
16190.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% and increases her FP by 20.0%. When this ship enters the battle: restores 40.0% of this ship's max HP. 5s after this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken, or 60s after she enters the battle: this ship leaves the battle.

16210.name: The Fighting Lady
16210.desc:
3s after the battle starts: launches a recon squadron consisting of AD-1 Skyraiders, inflicting the Marked debuff to a random enemy (prioritizing humanoid enemies) for 12s and decreasing that enemy's AA by $1. 
12s after this effect activates, or after the Marked enemy is sunk: restores 3.0% of this ship's max HP and launches another AD-1 Skyraider squadron (this HP recovery effect can only activate up to 5 times per battle). 
When this ship launches an airstrike, if she has Eagle Union aircraft equipped: launches a $2 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
16210.full:
3s after the battle starts: launches a recon squadron consisting of AD-1 Skyraiders, inflicting the Marked debuff to a random enemy (prioritizing humanoid enemies) for 12s and decreasing that enemy's AA by 6.0%. 
12s after this effect activates, or after the Marked enemy is sunk: restores 3.0% of this ship's max HP and launches another AD-1 Skyraider squadron (this HP recovery effect can only activate up to 5 times per battle). 
When this ship launches an airstrike, if she has Eagle Union aircraft equipped: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16220.name: Waltzing Beyond Tragedy
16220.desc:
When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Eagle Union ships afloat in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI and ACC by $1. 
Every 18s after the battle starts: $2 chance to fire a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and decreases this ship's Detection Gauge value by 2 once a second for 5s. 
While this ship is afloat, for the first 4 battles another fleet fights during a sortie: increases the FP of that fleet's Main Fleet Eagle Union ships by $4; 20s after that fleet's battle starts: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
16220.full:
When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Eagle Union ships afloat in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%. 
Every 18s after the battle starts: 100.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and decreases this ship's Detection Gauge value by 2 once a second for 5s. 
While this ship is afloat, for the first 4 battles another fleet fights during a sortie: increases the FP of that fleet's Main Fleet Eagle Union ships by 6.0%; 20s after that fleet's battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16230.name: The Eagle Soars Free
16230.desc:
When this ship launches an airstrike: decreases your Yorktown-class CVs' airstrike loading time by $1 and decreases it by $2 for your other Essex-class CVs (only affects the currently loading airstrike once; effect does not stack). 
Your Yorktown-class and Essex-class CVs gain the following effects during battle: 
1) increases their DMG dealt by $1; 
2) when they launch an airstrike: also launches a $3 interceptive airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
16230.full:
When this ship launches an airstrike: decreases your Yorktown-class CVs' airstrike loading time by 10.0% and decreases it by 8.0% for your other Essex-class CVs (only affects the currently loading airstrike once; effect does not stack). 
Your Yorktown-class and Essex-class CVs gain the following effects during battle: 
1) increases their DMG dealt by 10.0%; 
2) when they launch an airstrike: also launches a Lv.10 interceptive airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16250.name: Hornet's Sting
16250.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches a $1 special airstrike with aircraft torpedoes and rockets (DMG is based on the skill's level); inflicts a special Burn ailment to enemies hit by these rockets (Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat). Increases this ship's DMG dealt to enemy CLs and CVLs by $2.
16250.full: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike with aircraft torpedoes and rockets (DMG is based on the skill's level); inflicts a special Burn ailment to enemies hit by these rockets (Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat). Increases this ship's DMG dealt to enemy CLs and CVLs by 10.0%.

16260.name: Flying Ace
16260.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by $1 and increases her Fighter aircraft gear slot efficiency by $2. Every time this ship's aircraft shoot down an enemy aircraft: increases this ship's AVI by $3 (can be stacked up to 3 times).
16260.full: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0% and increases her Fighter aircraft gear slot efficiency by 15.0%. Every time this ship's aircraft shoot down an enemy aircraft: increases this ship's AVI by 4.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

16270.name: The Dancing Grey Ghost
