16270.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's EVA by $1 and decreases her DMG taken by $2. Once per battle, when this ship's max HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: this ship's Detection Gauge value is set to 0 and your Main Fleet takes no Ramming DMG for 8s.
16270.full: When the battle starts, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 10.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's max HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: this ship's Detection Gauge value is set to 0 and your Main Fleet takes no Ramming DMG for 8s.

16280.name: Ms. Langley's Guidance
16280.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI by $1 for each CV and CVL in your fleet. Increases this ship's DMG dealt with her first 2 airstrikes by $2 each battle.
16280.full: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% for each CV and CVL in your fleet. Increases this ship's DMG dealt with her first 2 airstrikes by 20.0% each battle.

16290.name: Ms. Langley's Strict Discipline
16290.desc: Increases the ACC of all your CVs and CVLs (excluding this ship) by $1. When this ship launches an airstrike: increases your CVs' and CVLs' DMG dealt by $2 for 8s.
16290.full: Increases the ACC of all your CVs and CVLs (excluding this ship) by 10.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: increases your CVs' and CVLs' DMG dealt by 10.0% for 8s.

16300.name: Flagship Cover - Hammann
16300.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases your CVs' and CVLs' airstrike DMG by $1 and decreases your Flagship's DMG taken by $2 (this DMG increasing effect does not stack with the skill "Air Raid Assistance" and this DMG decreasing effect does not stack with Hammann's "Flagship Cover" skill).
16300.full: While this ship is afloat: increases your CVs' and CVLs' airstrike DMG by 15.0% and decreases your Flagship's DMG taken by 25.0% (this DMG increasing effect does not stack with the skill "Air Raid Assistance" and this DMG decreasing effect does not stack with Hammann's "Flagship Cover" skill).

16310.name: Cautious Caprice
16310.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AA by $1. For every 2 enemy aircraft shot down within your Vanguard's Anti-Air Gun range: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 2.0% until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 4 times).
16310.full: Increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0%. For every 2 enemy aircraft shot down within your Vanguard's Anti-Air Gun range: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 2.0% until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 4 times).

16320.name: Artillery Overload
16320.desc: Every 10s: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When the battle starts, if there are any other Eagle Union ships in your fleet: when this barrage activates, performs a scan, marking 1 enemy and increasing that enemy's DMG taken by $2 from all types of Cruisers in your Vanguard for 10s.
16320.full: Every 10s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When the battle starts, if there are any other Eagle Union ships in your fleet: when this barrage activates, performs a scan, marking 1 enemy and increasing that enemy's DMG taken by 10.0% from all types of Cruisers in your Vanguard for 10s.

16330.name: Pilotfish
16330.desc: Increases this ship's EVA and ACC by $2. If your Flagship is a CV or a CVL, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, when your Flagship launches an airstrike: fires a $1 special barrage that ignores enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level; if your Flagship is an Eagle Union ship, the barrage also inflicts a -50.0% SPD debuff for 8s to enemies hit).
16330.full: Increases this ship's EVA and ACC by 15.0%. If your Flagship is a CV or a CVL, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, when your Flagship launches an airstrike: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that ignores enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level; if your Flagship is an Eagle Union ship, the barrage also inflicts a -50.0% SPD debuff for 8s to enemies hit).

16340.name: Unyielding Pathfinder
16340.desc: Once 3s after the battle starts, and with a $2 chance every 20s: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
16340.full: Once 3s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16350.name: Hope is Calamity's Handmaiden
16350.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1 and, if there are any other Northern Parliament ships in your fleet, decreases this ship's cannon DMG taken by $2. Once per battle, when this ship has lost a total of 25.0% of her max HP in a battle: restores $3 of this ship's max HP. Increases your Northern Parliament Vanguard ships' Crit DMG dealt by $4.
16350.full: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0% and, if there are any other Northern Parliament ships in your fleet, decreases this ship's cannon DMG taken by 10.0%. Once per battle, when this ship has lost a total of 25.0% of her max HP in a battle: restores 8.0% of this ship's max HP. Increases your Northern Parliament Vanguard ships' Crit DMG dealt by 30.0%.

16360.name: Blessings Through Benevolence
16360.desc: When the battle starts, for each Dragon Empery ship in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI and ACC by $1. If there is any other Dragon Empery ship in your fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $2. When this ship launches an airstrike: decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken by $3 for 8s (does not stack with the skill "Air Cover").
16360.full: When the battle starts, for each Dragon Empery ship in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 4.0%. If there is any other Dragon Empery ship in your fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken by 15.0% for 8s (does not stack with the skill "Air Cover").

16370.name: Brave Beauty
16370.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $2 until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 3 times) and launches an additional $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
16370.full: When this ship launches an airstrike: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 5.0% until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 3 times) and launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16380.name: All-Knowledgeable Appraiser
16380.desc:
When the battle starts, if there are any other ships in your Vanguard: increases this ship's SPD by 10. Every 20s: targets 2 random ships in your fleet and grants them a buff for 8s based on their hull classification; 
1) DD: increases TRP by $1; 2) CL, CA, or CB: increases FP by $2; 3) BB, BC, or BBV: increases ACC by $3; 4) CV or CVL: increases AVI by $4; 5) any other hull classification: increases AA by $5.
16380.full:
When the battle starts, if there are any other ships in your Vanguard: increases this ship's SPD by 10. Every 20s: targets 2 random ships in your fleet and grants them a buff for 8s based on their hull classification; 
1) DD: increases TRP by 8.0%; 2) CL, CA, or CB: increases FP by 8.0%; 3) BB, BC, or BBV: increases ACC by 8.0%; 4) CV or CVL: increases AVI by 8.0%; 5) any other hull classification: increases AA by 8.0%.

16390.name: Tricks of the Trade
16390.desc: If this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases this ship's Burn duration by 3s and decreases her and your Dragon Empery CVs' and CVLs' Burn DMG taken by $1. If this ship has the Cargo "Type-Wu Seaplane" equipped: increases this ship's AVI by $2 and Evasion Rate by $3 and, every 10s, launches a special $4 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
16390.full: If this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases this ship's Burn duration by 3s and decreases her and your Dragon Empery CVs' and CVLs' Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. If this ship has the Cargo "Type-Wu Seaplane" equipped: increases this ship's AVI by 30.0% and Evasion Rate by 12.0% and, every 10s, launches a special Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16400.name: Ariadne's Conundrum

19180.name: Kitakaze Style - Lotus Torpedoes
19180.desc: 10s after the start of battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: fires a special torpedo barrage ($1.) After every 10 hits with this ship's Torpedoes (barrage torpedoes do not count): fires this same barrage.
19180.full: 10s after the start of battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: fires a special torpedo barrage (Lv.10.) After every 10 hits with this ship's Torpedoes (barrage torpedoes do not count): fires this same barrage.

19190.name: Blazing Peaks
19190.desc: When this ship equips a Main Gun with a caliber of 280mm or higher: increases its Main Gun DMG based on the distance its shells travel to reach the enemy, up to a maximum of $1. Increases this ship's Burn DMG dealt by $2.
19190.full: When this ship equips a Main Gun with a caliber of 280mm or higher: increases its Main Gun DMG based on the distance its shells travel to reach the enemy, up to a maximum of 25.0%. Increases this ship's Burn DMG dealt by 50.0%.

19200.name: Mizuho's Intuition
19200.desc: Every 20s: $1 chance to increase this ship's EVA by $2 and Accuracy by $3 for 12s.
19200.full: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to increase this ship's EVA by 20.0% and Accuracy by 50.0% for 12s.

19210.name: Special Gunnery Training
19210.desc: Fires a special barrage once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns. While equipping the Prototype Triple 310mm Main Gun (Type 0): increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $1, lowers the number of shots needed to fire the barrage to 4, and improves the barrage.
19210.full: Fires a special barrage once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns. While equipping the Prototype Triple 310mm Main Gun (Type 0): increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 12.0%, lowers the number of shots needed to fire the barrage to 4, and improves the barrage.

19220.name: Symphony of Destruction
19220.desc: When this ship takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of this ship: fires a $1 special barrage that ignores the enemy's Armor Type (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) Has a 15s cooldown between activations.
19220.full: When this ship takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of this ship: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that ignores the enemy's Armor Type (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) Has a 15s cooldown between activations.

19230.name: Sonata of Chaos
19230.desc: When this ship fires an odd-numbered Salvo: increases its RLD by $1 and DMG dealt by $2 until its next reloaded Salvo. When this ship fires an even-numbered Salvo: increases its Crit Rate by $2 and Crit DMG by $1 until its next reloaded Salvo.
19230.full: When this ship fires an odd-numbered Salvo: increases its RLD by 50.0% and DMG dealt by 20.0% until its next reloaded Salvo. When this ship fires an even-numbered Salvo: increases its Crit Rate by 20.0% and Crit DMG by 50.0% until its next reloaded Salvo.

19240.name: Rhapsody of Darkness
19240.desc: Applies a buff to this ship based on its HP remaining. When between 100% and 70%: increases FP by $1; when between 70% and 30%: increases FP by $2 and decreases DMG taken by $2; when less than 30%: decreases DMG taken by $3.
19240.full: Applies a buff to this ship based on its HP remaining. When between 100% and 70%: increases FP by 20.0%; when between 70% and 30%: increases FP by 10.0% and decreases DMG taken by 10.0%; when less than 30%: decreases DMG taken by 20.0%.

19250.name: Emotion Inhibition Module
19250.desc: Up to twice per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: for 8s, increases this ship's EVA by $1 and restores a total of 8.0% of its max HP.
19250.full: Up to twice per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: for 8s, increases this ship's EVA by 30.0% and restores a total of 8.0% of its max HP.

19260.name: Precision Salvo Protocol
19260.desc: Each Main Gun reload gives this ship 2 Salvoes that can be fired independently. This ship's DMG bonus with manually aimed Salvoes becomes $2. Every 20s: $1 chance to fire a special barrage (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19260.full: Each Main Gun reload gives this ship 2 Salvoes that can be fired independently. This ship's DMG bonus with manually aimed Salvoes becomes 40.0%. Every 20s: 100% chance to fire a special barrage (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19270.name: Bounce Right Back
19270.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first wave of torpedoes by $1. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, EVA, and AA by $2 until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times.
19270.full: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first wave of torpedoes by 70.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, EVA, and AA by 5.0% until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

19280.name: Grin and Fire!
19280.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1. Every 12s after the start of the battle: $2 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19280.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 12s after the start of the battle: 100% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19290.name: The Fearless Privateer
19290.desc: Increases this ship's built-in Secondary Gun Crit Rate by $2 and improves its ammo. When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires Normal or HE ammo: this ship's Main Gun ammo type changes to $1 special HE with a chance to cause a special Burn to enemies (special HE DMG increase is based on the skill's level.)
19290.full: Increases this ship's built-in Secondary Gun Crit Rate by 50.0% and improves its ammo. When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires Normal or HE ammo: this ship's Main Gun ammo type changes to Lv.10 special HE with a chance to cause a special Burn to enemies (special HE DMG increase is based on the skill's level.)

19300.name: Flintlock Burst
19300.desc: Every $1s: fires a special barrage that ignores enemy shields and heals this ship for 15.0% of the DMG dealt (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and EVA by $2 and RLD by $3 until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times; if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard at the start of the battle: immediately gives all 3 stacks of this buff.
19300.full: Every 20s: fires a special barrage that ignores enemy shields and heals this ship for 15.0% of the DMG dealt (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and EVA by 5.0% and RLD by 7.0% until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times; if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard at the start of the battle: immediately gives all 3 stacks of this buff.

19310.name: Retaliatory Shield
19310.desc: Every 15s: deploys a shield in front of this ship that lasts 8s and can block up to 6 enemy shells; if this shield is destroyed within the allotted time: fires a barrage and increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by $1 until the end of the battle. This buff can be stacked twice.
19310.full: Every 15s: deploys a shield in front of this ship that lasts 8s and can block up to 6 enemy shells; if this shield is destroyed within the allotted time: fires a barrage and increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by 8.0% until the end of the battle. This buff can be stacked twice.

19320.name: Ausgewogen
19320.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: increases this ship's Speed by 5 and EVA by $1 until the end of the battle, and decreases its DMG taken by $2 for 30s; if NOT in the frontmost position: increases this ship's Crit DMG by $3 and, every 15s: has a $4 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19320.full: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: increases this ship's Speed by 5 and EVA by 12.0% until the end of the battle, and decreases its DMG taken by 15.0% for 30s; if NOT in the frontmost position: increases this ship's Crit DMG by 25.0% and, every 15s: has a 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19330.name: Mímir's Keen Eyes
19330.desc: Changes this ship's position and decreases its DMG taken by $1. Every 15s: commences a sonar scan, revealing the location of all enemy SSs for $2s, reducing their accuracy by $4, and decreasing your Vanguard's DMG taken from torpedoes by $3 for $2s.
19330.full: Changes this ship's position and decreases its DMG taken by 20.0%. Every 15s: commences a sonar scan, revealing the location of all enemy SSs for 10s, reducing their accuracy by 25.0%, and decreasing your Vanguard's DMG taken from torpedoes by 15.0% for 10s.

19340.name: Herteitr's Rolling Thunder
19340.desc: Every 18s: $1 chance to fire a special barrage with thunderbolts that ignore enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Changes the Spread Angle of this ship's torpedoes.
19340.full: Every 18s: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage with thunderbolts that ignore enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Changes the Spread Angle of this ship's torpedoes.

19350.name: Augmenting Mechanism: Setzer Principle
19350.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's Main Guns by $1 and fires an additional $2 barrage along with its primary Salvoes. Every 20s: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19350.full: Decreases the loading time of this ship's Main Guns by 40.0% and fires an additional Lv.10 barrage along with its primary Salvoes. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19360.name: Substitute Mechanism: Holy Thurible
19360.desc: When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires HE ammo: increases its FP by $4, AA by $1, and increases its HE DMG modifier against enemies with Heavy armor by $1; when using one that fires AP: increases this ship's FP by $4, RLD by $1, and increases its Crit Rate by $2. While this ship is above 75.0% HP: absorbs 50.0% of the DMG your Flagship takes (does nothing if this ship is the Flagship); when this ship's HP falls below 75.0%: increases this ship's EVA and Accuracy by $3.
19360.full: When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires HE ammo: increases its FP by 5.0%, AA by 15.0%, and increases its HE DMG modifier against enemies with Heavy armor by 15.0%; when using one that fires AP: increases this ship's FP by 5.0%, RLD by 15.0%, and increases its Crit Rate by 20.0%. While this ship is above 75.0% HP: absorbs 50.0% of the DMG your Flagship takes (does nothing if this ship is the Flagship); when this ship's HP falls below 75.0%: increases this ship's EVA and Accuracy by 15.0%.

19380.name: Sky-Rending Retribution
19380.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch an additional special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
19380.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to launch an additional special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

19390.name: Flame-Anointed Conquest
19390.desc: When this ship is equipped with a Fighter: fires a $1 special barrage every 12s; when this ship has no Fighters equipped: instead follows up her every Airstrike with a $2 slashing attack (barrage and slash attack DMG are based on the skill's level).
19390.full: When this ship is equipped with a Fighter: fires a Lv.10 special barrage every 12s; when this ship has no Fighters equipped: instead follows up her every Airstrike with a Lv.10 slashing attack (barrage and slash attack DMG are based on the skill's level).

19400.name: The Great One's Shadow
19400.desc: When this ship is equipped with Sakura Empire aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and Accuracy by $1; when none are equipped: instead increases this ship's AA and Accuracy by $1.
19400.full: When this ship is equipped with Sakura Empire aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and Accuracy by 15.0%; when none are equipped: instead increases this ship's AA and Accuracy by 15.0%.

19410.name: Engulfer of the Golden Vortex
19410.desc: When this ship's Torpedoes hit an enemy: decreases the target's Speed by $1 for 5s. As long as this ship is not Out of Ammo, increases this ship's EVA by $2.
19410.full: When this ship's Torpedoes hit an enemy: decreases the target's Speed by 60.0% for 5s. As long as this ship is not Out of Ammo, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%.

19420.name: Abyssal Banquet
19420.desc: When this ship is equipped with a Main Gun that fires Normal or AP ammo: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 and increases Crit Rate by $2; when equipping one that fires HE ammo: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $3, but makes her unable to Burn enemies. If the equipped Main Gun is high-caliber: also increases this ship's Main Gun Efficiency by $4.
19420.full: When this ship is equipped with a Main Gun that fires Normal or AP ammo: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0% and increases Crit Rate by 12.0%; when equipping one that fires HE ammo: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0%, but makes her unable to Burn enemies. If the equipped Main Gun is high-caliber: also increases this ship's Main Gun Efficiency by 12.0%.

19430.name: Jöttun's Jaws
19430.desc: If there are no enemies near this ship when she fires her Main Guns: inflicts Armor Break to all enemies hit; once every 8 times her Main Guns are fired: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship's Main Gun is high-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4.
19430.full: If there are no enemies near this ship when she fires her Main Guns: inflicts Armor Break to all enemies hit; once every 8 times her Main Guns are fired: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship's Main Gun is high-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4.

19440.name: Riddle Me This
19440.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by $1; when this ship fires her Torpedoes: $2 chance to fire a special barrage $3 (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead decreases the loading time of this ship's next wave of Torpedoes by 3s.
19440.full: Increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%; when this ship fires her Torpedoes: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage Lv.10 (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead decreases the loading time of this ship's next wave of Torpedoes by 3s.

19450.name: Hide and Seek
19450.desc: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: deploys a smokescreen and a barrier. Smokescreen lasts 5s and increases Evasion Rate by $1 for all your ships in it (does not stack with other smokescreen skills). The barrier lasts 5s and can absorb DMG up to $2 of this ship's max HP. If this barrier is destroyed before it expires: this ship gains 100% Evasion Rate for 2s.
19450.full: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: deploys a smokescreen and a barrier. Smokescreen lasts 5s and increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (does not stack with other smokescreen skills). The barrier lasts 5s and can absorb DMG up to 6.0% of this ship's max HP. If this barrier is destroyed before it expires: this ship gains 100% Evasion Rate for 2s.

19460.name: Hex-Principle of Insight
19460.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to inflict 234 DMG to all enemies and gradually reduce their SPD to 0 over 2.5s, then returning to normal instantly after 1s.
19460.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 75.0% chance to inflict 234 DMG to all enemies and gradually reduce their SPD to 0 over 2.5s, then returning to normal instantly after 1s.

19470.name: Hex-Principle of Shattering
19470.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). Inflicts Armor Break to all Light and Medium armor enemies hit by this airstrike.
19470.full: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). Inflicts Armor Break to all Light and Medium armor enemies hit by this airstrike.

19480.name: Hex-Principle of Dominance
19480.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to CLs and CAs by $1. When this ship is equipped with Iron Blood aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and RLD by $2 and Fighter efficiency by $3.
19480.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to CLs and CAs by 20.0%. When this ship is equipped with Iron Blood aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and RLD by 12.0% and Fighter efficiency by 10.0%.

19490.name: Legendary Voyage
19490.desc: When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: decreases the DMG penalty's effect by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a frontal barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: heals this ship for 5.0% of her max HP.
19490.full: When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: decreases the DMG penalty's effect by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a frontal barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: heals this ship for 5.0% of her max HP.

19500.name: Il Milione
19500.desc: If there is at least 1 other Sardegnian ship in your fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1. At the start of the battle, if the frontmost ship in your Vanguard is a Sardegnian ship: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $2 and her AA Gun efficiency by 50.0%; if said ship is not Sardegnian, instead spawns 2 shields around that ship that can block 3 enemy torpedoes.
19500.full: If there is at least 1 other Sardegnian ship in your fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0%. At the start of the battle, if the frontmost ship in your Vanguard is a Sardegnian ship: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 10.0% and her AA Gun efficiency by 50.0%; if said ship is not Sardegnian, instead spawns 2 shields around that ship that can block 3 enemy torpedoes.

19510.name: Untold Tales
19510.desc: During a sortie, whenever the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's AA and EVA by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times). While this ship is afloat: launches a $2 supporting barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) 20s after a fleet this ship is NOT in starts its 1st and 2nd battles that sortie; for said fleet's 3rd and 4th battles: decreases DMG taken by $3 for your Sardegnian ships.
19510.full: During a sortie, whenever the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's AA and EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). While this ship is afloat: launches a Lv.10 supporting barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) 20s after a fleet this ship is NOT in starts its 1st and 2nd battles that sortie; for said fleet's 3rd and 4th battles: decreases DMG taken by 8.0% for your Sardegnian ships.

19530.name: Rejoice in Radiance
19530.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. If sortied with another Royal Navy ship, or if this ship has Royal Navy gear equipped: increases this ship's EVA by $2.
19530.full: When the battle starts, increases this ship's FP and ACC by 12.0%. If sortied with another Royal Navy ship, or if this ship has Royal Navy gear equipped: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%.

19540.name: Pathfinder's Shroud
19540.desc: Every 10s: fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and becomes Shrouded for 5s (while Shrouded, this ship takes $2 less DMG; upon becoming Shrouded for the 3rd time, she also restores $3 of her max HP). Enemies hit by this barrage become Exposed for 10s; Exposed enemies take $1 increased DMG from your Flagship if she is a BB, BC, or BBV.
19540.full: Every 10s: fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and becomes Shrouded for 5s (while Shrouded, this ship takes 10.0% less DMG; upon becoming Shrouded for the 3rd time, she also restores 10.0% of her max HP). Enemies hit by this barrage become Exposed for 10s; Exposed enemies take 18.0% increased DMG from your Flagship if she is a BB, BC, or BBV.

19550.name: Lindwurm - Devouring Fang
19550.desc: During battle, this ship gains a $1 special Secondary Gun; every 5 times she fires this Secondary Gun: launches a $2 special torpedo barrage (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level); the 8th time she fires this Secondary Gun: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $3.
19550.full: During battle, this ship gains a Lv.10 special Secondary Gun; every 5 times she fires this Secondary Gun: launches a Lv.10 special torpedo barrage (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level); the 8th time she fires this Secondary Gun: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

19560.name: Lindwurm - Protector's Oculus
19560.desc: When the battle starts, if this ship is your Flagship: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1; if NOT your Flagship, decreases DMG taken by the ship above your Flagship by $2. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $3 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
19560.full: When the battle starts, if this ship is your Flagship: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%; if NOT your Flagship, decreases DMG taken by the ship above your Flagship by 8.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 80% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

19580.name: Impactful Torpedoes
19580.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from torpedoes by 10.0%; Increases DMG dealt against Heavy Armor enemies with this ship's equipped torpedoes by $1, and increases the torpedo DMG dealt by Dragon Empery DDs by $4. When this ship fires her torpedoes: creates a smokescreen for 3s that increases Evasion Rate by $3 and decreases DMG taken from enemy aircraft by $3 for all your ships inside it (this effect does not stack with "Smokescreen: Light Cruisers"); After 3s, $2 chance to launch an additional wave of torpedoes and trigger this smokescreen effect again.
19580.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from torpedoes by 10.0%; Increases DMG dealt against Heavy Armor enemies with this ship's equipped torpedoes by 20.0%, and increases the torpedo DMG dealt by Dragon Empery DDs by 12.0%. When this ship fires her torpedoes: creates a smokescreen for 3s that increases Evasion Rate by 35.0% and decreases DMG taken from enemy aircraft by 35.0% for all your ships inside it (this effect does not stack with "Smokescreen: Light Cruisers"); After 3s, 100.0% chance to launch an additional wave of torpedoes and trigger this smokescreen effect again.

19590.name: Blazing Battledance
19590.desc: Every 20s: $1 chance to launch a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship takes DMG: 20.0% chance to increase this ship's FP and AA by $2 and TRP by $3 (can be stacked up to 3 times).
19590.full: Every 20s: 100.0% chance to launch a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship takes DMG: 20.0% chance to increase this ship's FP and AA by 4.0% and TRP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

19600.name: Aviation Experiment - Coordinated Bombardment
19600.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI and RLD by $1. When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional $2 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; $3 chance on launch to improve this special airstrike).
19600.full: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI and RLD by 15.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; 80% chance on launch to improve this special airstrike).

19610.name: Contingency Experiment - Suppressive Fire
19610.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Medium and Heavy Armor enemies by $1. When this ship's airstrike finishes loading: fires a special barrage that decreases the AA of enemies hit by 10.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; AA debuff cannot be stacked).
19610.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Medium and Heavy Armor enemies by 10.0%. When this ship's airstrike finishes loading: fires a special barrage that decreases the AA of enemies hit by 10.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; AA debuff cannot be stacked).

19630.name: Ensemble of Exultation
19630.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships in your Vanguard: increases this ship's EVA by $2 and decreases her DMG taken by $3.
19630.full: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships in your Vanguard: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 12.0%.

19640.name: Aria of Alacrity
19640.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's SPD by 3 and EVA by $1. If this ship has Iris Libre gear equipped: increases this ship's Main Gun Crit DMG and AA by $2.
19640.full: When the battle starts, increases this ship's SPD by 3 and EVA by 10.0%. If this ship has Iris Libre gear equipped: increases this ship's Main Gun Crit DMG and AA by 15.0%.

19650.name: Panacea's Paean
19650.desc: Once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship's Main Gun is large-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4 and changes the properties of this barrage. The 1st time this barrage fires every battle: restores $2 max HP to the ship with the lowest percentage HP left in your fleet; the 2nd time this barrage fires: restores $3 of this ship's max HP.
19650.full: Once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship's Main Gun is large-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4 and changes the properties of this barrage. The 1st time this barrage fires every battle: restores 8.0% max HP to the ship with the lowest percentage HP left in your fleet; the 2nd time this barrage fires: restores 6.0% of this ship's max HP.

19659.name: 布雷斯特展示关卡用
19659.desc: Once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship's Main Gun is large-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4 and changes the properties of this barrage. The 1st time this barrage fires every battle: restores $2 max HP to the ship with the lowest percentage HP left in your fleet; the 2nd time this barrage fires: restores $3 of this ship's max HP.
19659.full: Once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship's Main Gun is large-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4 and changes the properties of this barrage. The 1st time this barrage fires every battle: restores 8.0% max HP to the ship with the lowest percentage HP left in your fleet; the 2nd time this barrage fires: restores 6.0% of this ship's max HP.

101010.name: Protagonist Aura
101010.desc: If deployed with any other Neptunia ship, increases own damage by $1 and decreases own damage taken by 6.0%. For every other Neptunia ship deployed, further increases own damage by $2,and decreases own damage taken by 1.0%
101010.full: If deployed with any other Neptunia ship, increases own damage by 10.0% and decreases own damage taken by 6.0%. For every other Neptunia ship deployed, further increases own damage by 2.0%,and decreases own damage taken by 1.0%

101020.name: Medistation S
101020.desc: Upon taking damage, $1 chance to increase own damage dealt by $2 for 8 seconds.
101020.full: Upon taking damage, 8.0% chance to increase own damage dealt by 25.0% for 8 seconds.

101030.name: Power Break
101030.desc: If in the same fleet as Vert or Green Heart, increases own damage dealt by $1 and damage taken by $2. Otherwise, decreases own damage taken by $3 and damage dealt by $4.
101030.full: If in the same fleet as Vert or Green Heart, increases own damage dealt by 25.0% and damage taken by 15.0%. Otherwise, decreases own damage taken by 25.0% and damage dealt by 15.0%.

101040.name: Assam Link
101040.desc: For each Destroyer in the fleet, increases own reload by $2 and reduces damage taken from shelling by $1.
101040.full: For each Destroyer in the fleet, increases own reload by 5.0% and reduces damage taken from shelling by 5.0%.

101050.name: Cross Combination
101050.desc: Every $1 times the main gun is fired, the next main gun salvo will critically strike.
101050.full: Every 6 times the main gun is fired, the next main gun salvo will critically strike.

101060.name: Victory Slash
101060.desc: After 115 seconds in combat, unleashes a devastating barrage ($1). Can only activate once per combat.
101060.full: After 115 seconds in combat, unleashes a devastating barrage (Lv.10). Can only activate once per combat.

101070.name: Blaze Break

1010610.full: Increases this ship's DMG dealt with HE ammo by 25.0% and increases her Burn Rate against enemies by 3.0%. Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Burning enemies by 16.0%; while there is a Burning enemy float, increases this ship's EVA by 16.0%.

1010670.name: Lonely Queen of the North+
1010670.desc: When there are no non-Iron Blood BBs or BCs in your Main Fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $1.
1010670.full: When there are no non-Iron Blood BBs or BCs in your Main Fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 30.0%.

1010690.name: Iron Blood Hawk+
1010690.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional $2 airstrike. If this ship has at least 1 Iron Blood aircraft equipped: increases the efficiency of all of this ship's aircraft gear slots by $1.
1010690.full: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike. If this ship has at least 1 Iron Blood aircraft equipped: increases the efficiency of all of this ship's aircraft gear slots by 30.0%.

1010730.name: The Demon+
1010730.desc: Increases this ship's torpedo DMG dealt by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 5.0% chance to increase this ship's TRP by $2 for 12s (5s cooldown between activations). When the battle starts: increases this ship's TRP by $3 for 8s; after this buff expires, decreases this ship's DMG taken by $4 until the battle ends.
1010730.full: Increases this ship's torpedo DMG dealt by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 5.0% chance to increase this ship's TRP by 60.0% for 12s (5s cooldown between activations). When the battle starts: increases this ship's TRP by 100.0% for 8s; after this buff expires, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0% until the battle ends.

1011380.name: Departing Strike+
1011380.desc: When this boat arrives at her attack position: increases TRP and ACC by $2 for your Sakura Empire SSs and SSVs and increases DMG dealt against enemy CAs and CBs by $1. When this boat retreats from battle: fires a special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1011380.full: When this boat arrives at her attack position: increases TRP and ACC by 10.0% for your Sakura Empire SSs and SSVs and increases DMG dealt against enemy CAs and CBs by 15.0%. When this boat retreats from battle: fires a special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1011500.name: Radiant Iris+
1011500.desc: When this ship's Main Gun damages the same target consecutively (if an attack hits multiple targets at once, they are all designated for this effect): increases this ship's RLD by $1 and FP by $2 (effect can only activate once every second; buff can be stacked up to 4 times); when this ship hits a different target, the RLD buff is reset. The first time each battle the max number of stacks is reached: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $3 and improves this ship's "All Out Assault" skill until the battle ends.
1011500.full: When this ship's Main Gun damages the same target consecutively (if an attack hits multiple targets at once, they are all designated for this effect): increases this ship's RLD by 40.0% and FP by 5.0% (effect can only activate once every second; buff can be stacked up to 4 times); when this ship hits a different target, the RLD buff is reset. The first time each battle the max number of stacks is reached: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0% and improves this ship's "All Out Assault" skill until the battle ends.

1011540.name: Final Shot+
1011540.desc: Every 20s, fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). While this ship is equipping the Quadruple 380mm Main Gun (Mle 1935): increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by $2 and Main Gun Crit DMG by $1.
1011540.full: Every 20s, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). While this ship is equipping the Quadruple 380mm Main Gun (Mle 1935): increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 30.0% and Main Gun Crit DMG by 50.0%.

1011620.name: Predestined Launch+
1011620.desc: When this ship's airstrike has finished loading: launches 2 additional randomly chosen airstrikes consisting of Ryusei, Suisei, or Saiun squadrons, with a $1 chance to launch the remaining squadron not chosen. (Saiuns do not attack, instead increasing your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by 10.0% for 8s when launched.)
1011620.full: When this ship's airstrike has finished loading: launches 2 additional randomly chosen airstrikes consisting of Ryusei, Suisei, or Saiun squadrons, with a 25.0% chance to launch the remaining squadron not chosen. (Saiuns do not attack, instead increasing your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by 10.0% for 8s when launched.)

1011670.name: Surpriiiiiiiise!+
1011670.desc: 5s after this boat enters the battle, when she resurfaces, and when she leaves the battle: fires a $1 special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that Burns enemies hit (Burn DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat).
1011670.full: 5s after this boat enters the battle, when she resurfaces, and when she leaves the battle: fires a Lv.10 special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that Burns enemies hit (Burn DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat).

1011700.name: Bold But Reckless+
1011700.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by $2, FP by $3, and SPD by 3. Every 20s: $1 chance to launch a $4 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if there is another Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ship in your Vanguard: fires this barrage 3s after the battle starts.
1011700.full: Increases this ship's EVA by 12.0%, FP by 25.0%, and SPD by 3. Every 20s: 70.0% chance to launch a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if there is another Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ship in your Vanguard: fires this barrage 3s after the battle starts.

1011710.name: Dullahan+
1011710.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $2 until the battle ends and, for 16s, decreases this ship's SPD by 2 while restoring $1 of this ship's and 1.0% of all your Vanguard ships' max HP, respectively, once every 3s. If this skill does not activate within 40s of the battle starting: restores $3 of this ship's max HP.
1011710.full: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% until the battle ends and, for 16s, decreases this ship's SPD by 2 while restoring 4.0% of this ship's and 1.0% of all your Vanguard ships' max HP, respectively, once every 3s. If this skill does not activate within 40s of the battle starting: restores 5.0% of this ship's max HP.

1011900.name: Protector of the North Passage+
1011900.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: 1) performs a scan, revealing the location of enemy SSs, decreasing their SPD by 40.0%, and increasing their DMG taken by 10.0% for $1s; 2) launches an additional airstrike consisting of Swordfishes armed with anti-sub and anti-surface torpedoes (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1011900.full: When this ship launches an airstrike: 1) performs a scan, revealing the location of enemy SSs, decreasing their SPD by 40.0%, and increasing their DMG taken by 10.0% for 10s; 2) launches an additional airstrike consisting of Swordfishes armed with anti-sub and anti-surface torpedoes (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1012670.name: Fuoco di Copertura!+
1012670.desc: Every 20s, if this ship is in the backmost position of your Vanguard (there must be 2 or more ships afloat in your Vanguard): $1 chance to increase this ship's DMG dealt by $2 and increase the DMG dealt by the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard by $3 for 10s. Every 20s: fires a $4 special barrage.
1012670.full: Every 20s, if this ship is in the backmost position of your Vanguard (there must be 2 or more ships afloat in your Vanguard): 100% chance to increase this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% and increase the DMG dealt by the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard by 15.0% for 10s. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage.

1090010.name: Fleet Carrier - Glorious
1090010.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: increases your Vanguard's DMG dealt by $1 for 8s (effect does not stack with the skill "Fleet Carrier"). When the battle starts, increases the efficiency of this ship's aircraft by $2.
1090010.full: When this ship launches an airstrike: increases your Vanguard's DMG dealt by 15.0% for 8s (effect does not stack with the skill "Fleet Carrier"). When the battle starts, increases the efficiency of this ship's aircraft by 20.0%.

1090020.name: Full Firepower - Karlsruhe
1090020.desc: Every 20s: $1 chance to increase this ship's FP by $2 for 10s; when this effect activates, performs a special slash attack.
1090020.full: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to increase this ship's FP by 40.0% for 10s; when this effect activates, performs a special slash attack.

1090030.name: Anti-Air Mode - Montpelier
1090030.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by $3. When this ship fires her AA guns: 25.0% chance to increase this ship's AA by $1, but decrease her FP by $2, for 3s; if this ship has Eagle Union gear equipped, this AA buff is doubled and the FP debuff does not apply. Every 20s: 25.0% chance to increase this ship's DMG dealt by $4 for 8s.
1090030.full: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%. When this ship fires her AA guns: 25.0% chance to increase this ship's AA by 40.0%, but decrease her FP by 20.0%, for 3s; if this ship has Eagle Union gear equipped, this AA buff is doubled and the FP debuff does not apply. Every 20s: 25.0% chance to increase this ship's DMG dealt by 25.0% for 8s.

1090040.name: Wolf Pack Formation - U-557
1090040.desc: Increases this boat's TRP, ACC, and RLD by $1 for each Iron Blood SS in the same fleet. When this boat leaves the battle: fires a $2 special barrage based on the number of hits this boat scored with her torpedoes (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1090040.full: Increases this boat's TRP, ACC, and RLD by 6.0% for each Iron Blood SS in the same fleet. When this boat leaves the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage based on the number of hits this boat scored with her torpedoes (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090050.name: Full Firepower - Nagara
1090050.desc: Every 20s: $1 chance to increase this ship's FP by $2 for 10s. When this effect successfully activates: the ship in your Vanguard with the lowest percentage HP remaining recovers 1.5% of her max HP; if the recipient of this effect is any Sakura Empire ship other than Nagara: increases that ship's and Nagara's AA by $3 for 5s (if Nagara herself is the recipient, the AA buff only stacks once).
1090050.full: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to increase this ship's FP by 40.0% for 10s. When this effect successfully activates: the ship in your Vanguard with the lowest percentage HP remaining recovers 1.5% of her max HP; if the recipient of this effect is any Sakura Empire ship other than Nagara: increases that ship's and Nagara's AA by 10.0% for 5s (if Nagara herself is the recipient, the AA buff only stacks once).

1090060.name: Double Gun - Wichita
1090060.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by $2. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire an additional attack, followed by a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1090060.full: Increases this ship's EVA by 20.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 25.0% chance to fire an additional attack, followed by a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090070.name: Artillery Command - Sims
1090070.desc: Increases your DDs' FP by $1 (does not stack with other "Artillery Command" skills.) Every 10s: fires a $2 special barrage; enemies hit by this barrage take 15.0% more cannon DMG from your DDs for 5s.
1090070.full: Increases your DDs' FP by 15.0% (does not stack with other "Artillery Command" skills.) Every 10s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage; enemies hit by this barrage take 15.0% more cannon DMG from your DDs for 5s.

1090080.name: Torpedo Command - Kagerou
1090080.desc: Increases your Vanguard's TRP by $1 (does not stack with other "Torpedo Command" skills). While this ship is afloat, when the fleet this ship is in starts a battle: further increases this ship's TRP by $2 and increases your Vanguard's Torpedo Crit Rate by $3.
1090080.full: Increases your Vanguard's TRP by 15.0% (does not stack with other "Torpedo Command" skills). While this ship is afloat, when the fleet this ship is in starts a battle: further increases this ship's TRP by 15.0% and increases your Vanguard's Torpedo Crit Rate by 15.0%.

1090090.name: Fading Memories of Glory - Cavour
1090090.desc:
10s after the battle starts: launches a $3 special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on this ship's TRP stat and the skill's level); every 15s after that: increases this ship's ACC by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times) and fires a $4 special barrage (DMG is based on this ship's FP stat and the skill level). 
5s after this ship fires her first Main Gun volley: increases this ship's FP by $1 and increases her DMG dealt to CLs by $2 until the battle ends, but sets her TRP stat to 0.
1090090.full:
10s after the battle starts: launches a Lv.10 special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on this ship's TRP stat and the skill's level); every 15s after that: increases this ship's ACC by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times) and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on this ship's FP stat and the skill level). 
5s after this ship fires her first Main Gun volley: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and increases her DMG dealt to CLs by 20.0% until the battle ends, but sets her TRP stat to 0.
